Review Text: ordered pizza and they were unable to serve then ordered set menu and then they took more than one hour to serve that setmenu.. and food quatity was so poor. please develop these quAlities.customers will surely come to enjoy. but my and my friends experience is so pathetic.as I proposed them to go there so it was my concern.so pathetic. ðŸ˜‘

I went there for a family dinner . Had the set menu with BBQ chicken and naan, and believe me when I tell you I was utterly disgusted to my core as I've never had BBQ chicken or rather any food in any restaurant that bad. The chicken was bland as hell, tasted like a boiled piece of rubber and almost smelled bad . I don't know if they were having a bad day or something, but the most painful thing was it took them more than 1:30 hours to serve that 'Horror in a plate' .My parents had other set menu items which also included BBQ chicken that tasted almost as bad as mine. Though the staff behavior was good it doesn't make up for the bad food and the long wait. I don't know if my experience was an accident on their part or not but it sure was horrific .

Today I was parcel 4 crispy chicken fried. I reached my house & some little bit while I am started eat and it is very bad smell & couldn't not possible to eat......another many times same case of other item....sometimes it is really to bad
The worst food I ever experienced.. Soup was like steamed water ... And set menu rice chicken are taste less chicken contained heavy food colour.. Which can cause cancer..
very bad service... just tym & tk waste. behaviour very bad.. decoration very bad.... should close it or improve quality
Worst possible service!! They are super rude and didn't give food on time for iftar.
cream of cheese pasta 2/10 fusilli pasta 6/10 Beef Arabian pasta 2/10
Service Was Good. Restaurant Is So Nice, Near By Lal Khella. Waiter are Well Behaved. But Food Isn't So Good.

It used to be one of my favorite places for food but my last three visits were absolute disappointment. The chickens were so dry and tasteless. My favorite charbroiled chicken totally lost its texture and top of that they reduced the size of the chicken pieces. Hope the management take these issues seriously.

Quality and test of food is not great, also food is not well coordinated so you have to ended up paying high for a family dinner. Also they are not transparent when put advertisement as last week they put advert that there will be buy one get one free but didnâ€™t mention time frame so when I reach they told that time is over.

Used to love the food, but recently they have deteriorated very badly. The chicken seem pre-cooked and reheated, and the flavours are not as vibrant. Portions have decreased, too, so I go to Namdo's downstairs instead.

#negative review Place :Cafe bbq / bbq bd gulshan 2 Food : 6/10 Drinks :2/10 Service 2/10... Gelam ek friend er sathe khaite. 2 joner e pet motamuti vora cilo bole nilam share platter namer item ta jar price 1000 Platter includes all these and 2 drinks according to description. Pic dawa platter tar ar 2 ta fancy drink er. Order korar sathe sathe amak jigesh korlo sir drink ki niben. Bollam ki option ase? Bollo blue mojito na ki jani Ekta aro 2 -3 ta bollo and green apple er Ekta. Ami bollam apnader jei 2 ta iccha den eigula moddhe. Bollo sir blue ta e green apple ta ani? Bollam anen. Sudhu platter ta ar ei 2 ta drink amader dilo. Bolai vaguely platter ta sufficient na 2 joner jonno ar drink gila as usual fancy namer sprite. Minimum kono variety nai. Bill dawar somoy dekhlam total jeolhan 1150 howar kotha.ami deke Ekjon o bollam drinks to included she bollo sir taito asole sorry vul maybe.pore arekjon eshe bollo na sir vul nai.ami bollam drinks to included na? Bola holo na sir drinks bolte sudhu sprite included Baki 2 ta paid. Apnak sprite ta ene dibo sir? Amak er age sprite ta dawa o hoinai bola o hoinai er kotha. Misleading information er jonno amar 2 ta rong be rong er sprite nite. Ami bolsi vai ami bill o dea disi ekhn sprite dea ki korbo? Amar kotha na sune tao ene dise.ami jigesh korlam amak clearly bola hoinai keno bolle hasi dilo sudhu Ekta. Ami kotha barai nai but barpari type misleading info dawa amar thik lage nai.

Yesterday me with couple of my friends went there for ifter. The food was cold & may b pre cooked. The stuff's behavior was not friendly at all. We should have soft drinks with the packages but after giving the reminder of 3 times they didn't serve the drinks.

The worst F&B service I have ever experienced today. They deliver me like freezing food and even after complain they repeatedly change and deliver the same freezing food for three times. Totally screwed up for Gulshan 2 outlet. :(
Iftar platter was too bad. The whole food was served cold. Rice was hard like hell. very disappointed with this iftar platter.
Iftari platters are disgusting. Just tried it yesterday at gulshan branch. Tasteless and we all wasted the foods.

Went here today to have Ramadan Meal One (Jamaican grilled chicken) with my family...The meal was absolutely cold and the Jamaican grilled chicken, Chicken shashlik was hard!!! It was not delicious and filling meal at all, rather it was uneatable!!! I went there several times, but didnâ€™t have this sort of experience before. If I knew that I have to eat this shit, I would have ordered the regular menu. It is absolutely cheating.

The food was good. Pasta was poor. But, the no of staff are very less. Can't manage. Don't visit there on Friday. There was almost none to check your requirements. Poor very poor. You pay a lot but you don't get even 20% of the service. Needs lots of improvement in terms of customer service.

One should never order a pizza in this place. It was just below average standard. Home mades are far better than this. Code F 14: They attarct you by writing 20 pieces, but they don't tell you it's only a full chicken. Taka 1465 is not worthy of the plate at any standard of bd, may it be a chain shop. Code GC10: Jamaican chicken was good. Soup was good and had its signature mark with taste. Nice place but congested. ... Parking is a problem as usual. Security guards are eager for tips but has little idea of guiding a vehicle to park.
I ordered kids meal for my baby.. and that chicken was smelling like a rotten egg... yaak!!.. and it was the second time that happened to me...they are so irresponsible... very unexpected...
Food quality is disgusting. Price .. oh no need bank loan to order a full meal

Your design works and campaigns are not communicative.. You should have professional people to handle these... Your FB page page don't represent an international brand sorry to say... And don't you use Olive oil any more!!

We tried four different pizza.all tasted almost same.no salt,no spice,thin crust.the chef should learn how to make pizza.the kiwi chiller just had syrup and sprite in it.not a single piece of kiwi was there.tastes was also not upto the mark. Overall sucks.not coming again.
Worst service. The waiters are very ill mannered. Never gonna come back

Went to Gulshan Branch yesterday. I usually like their food but yesterday's service was the poorest! I didn't get 10% discount on SCB credit card though my bill was above TK. 3,000! Had to asked them couple of time to provide the promotional coupon. Very much disappointed!

I had the pasta and I think something was wrong with the prawns. I had food poisoning afterwards and was sick. I also asked for butter to put on the bread but they didn't have it. The play area and balloons were nice
Last time the foods test was too bad.i was the regular customer of bbq bt i feel slowly slowly the food test becoming low types...i m disappointed...
It was buy one get one offer on pizza. Pizza was disaster. Worst pizza I have ever had .

went at dinner tonight at dhanmondi branch....food was good but I have question about the manners & etiquette of waiters. While I was waiting for my guest after reserving the seats, they asked me rudely as if my guest are coming or not they have other reservation (have to mention that only half an hour passed after I took the seats and half the reserved seats are filled already!!!). After challenging them why they didn't take my reservation earlier when I called, they started... to say they wanted the seats because some ppl just came and ask for seat (I don't see those reservation ppl coming at all that night)....in between the conservation, one waiter said they did 30k per day business as if I give a damn shit about it (30k per day!!! seriously!!! as a brand like yours.......com'on man so poor!!!). After ordering the starter and 1st round of order, they seemed surprised to ask us that 5 person and only 4 dishes!!! REALLY THIS IS THE WAY YOU BEHAVE WITH YOUR CUSTOMERS!!! If someone order food cost 200tk or 20000tk, both are your customers. You should give your staff proper lesson on manners then let them serve for your brand because its degrading the brand value.

I don't understand why you don't inform your customers properly about your offers for them.it is really unexpected from a brand like you.you tell clearly the offer for pizza will be available on Saturday till further notice.but the truth is different.when we reach your dhanmondi branch after a long busy traffic,you say very easily the offer has ended without prior notice.this is how you serve your customer?don't know what is important to you?customer or profit?speechless... just now I saw some other reviews,I experienced you did the same with some other guests also.
Environment is nice, food and prices terrible. Burger seems like only hot bread.
Bit overpriced compared to their taste.Also the interior of dhanmondi branch is nothing special.
Not up to the mark service... Waiters insisting having certain items from the menu... Not quality food... n irrational price range!!! Disappointing......

Food was ok but they robbed me by including items in the bill which I have not ordered and did not receive; I went to the cashier and before paying I have told him that I have not ordered this but he says its been billed and he is "feeling dukkhito" for this. I had an argument with the manager and was expecting something complimentary but he was also "feeling dukkhito" and said will consider me with good service next time as if I am a beggar to beg them for money or anything. I told them you all stole money and that's wrong and I don't live abroad so it does not matter whatever you do next time. VERY DISAPPOINTED WITH THEM AND WILL NEVER COME BACK WHEN I AM IN BANGALDESH.

Dhanmondi branch has the worst quality of food and the worst food quality of customer service. I have never been through such a horrible experience before. And that horrible experience incurred at a very high price. Will never visit again.
Food was over priced and not up to the mark in taste! If you are going to charge that much the least you can do is to improve your cooking! The pasta was runny ?!?!???

I went to Bailey road branch. The pizza is so poor i felt it was just robbery. The cheese was very thin and the bread was thin too. The topping was also very low in quantity. It felt like , i am having a ruti with some vaji :p The behaviour was good though and that's why i am giving 2 star. Never going to try again unless the food quality improves.

Today we had the most awful experience at BbQ Dhanmondi branch. They have been offering the 50% discount on beverage and i liked their frappe everytime so went their tonight as it was the last night. And even though we had called at their number and verified that the store was open they denied to serve us the frappes! Not ony that, after providing us the menue the waiter was taking a while to come back. I found that the waiter and the manager was solving a dispute with ano...ther client. So called another younger waiter who was walking towards the table then the other waiter made him stop. He literally stoped him coming towards us and then he took another 5mins to solve the dispute.then this waiter and the manager had another chat, more like whispered in the years then they both came to tell they cannot serve the Frappe!!! They said they ran out of all ingredients! They literally didn't want to make the drinks as it was close to the closing time. They has an offer going on and it cannot be that they ran out of every single ingredients of all the drinks!! Even though we had said we didn't want anything else at all that being an International Chain they should be serving us they denied us completely!! I should also mention we went to the Dhanmondi branch just this friday night and the pizza was terrible too!!! It was nothing like the Gulshan branch pizza. Really really disappointed by this ignorant attitude and i doubt i will ever go back.
Soft drink 99+vat . :( It is too expensive. Others

Okay, here's an honest review. Went to the Dhanmondi Branch yesterday and the food was okay. It was nothing completely out of the ordinary and that would have been completely alright had the items not been priced premium. The service was absolutely horrible! I mean how are you guys still in business with the current lot of waiters? A waiter literally tried to force an item on us by repeatedly insisting in the rudest of manners and the most annoyed of expressions. We had to ca...ll the waiters multiple times before any of them responded, every time. No, they weren't busy, just standing at the nearest tissues counter (or something) doing absolutely nothing. It took them about 15 minutes to get the bill and another 15 to return the change. The music was too loud and they did not turn down the volume even after we requested them to. Please take note that we have not been rude to any of the servers even once through out the whole process. Now, considering the fact that the Dhanmondi branch is a relatively new outlet, the cutlery items used should still be in relatively good condition but they were not. Most of the spoons had so many scratch marks on them that it almost gave the feeling that we had been provided with used utensils from the older branches. Does not reflect the class BBQ BD claims to boast. Not a good experience overall. Not sure if I wanna go back there, not anytime soon at least. P.S.- Can provide pictures if necessary.

Bbq Bangladesh Dhanmondi Branch is a big disappointment, Menu card's price of each item really differs with the price of the bill,I have tried your Gulshan branch for almost 6-7times and I loved it, no complains from there.. And 2times at your dhanmondi branch.. My experience was bad both the times there.dhanmondi branch serves completely different quality of food, it's too bad , the quantity of your pane cream soup was very low.. Taste of chicken was bad and served cold. The... second time I went there, the taste of the food was average and I clearly remember that I ordered food costing around 1500 -1600tk on the menu card( Korean Charboiled chicken 3pcs chicken, 1 piece jamaican chicken meal with mashed potatoes and 3 cocacolas). They charged me the double on their bill around 3000tk. I have calculated on my own and it would have been around 1800tk-2000tk with vat and service charge. This was a clear fraud.. This might also be an inside fraud between the manager and the waiters so the authority must take this into consideration.I am never going back to bbq bangladesh again. This was not only me who faced such a problem but also I know few more people disappointed with Bbq Bangladesh dhanmondi's bill problem.
Ate iftar platter. Grilled jamaican chicken was good. But fried rice was terrible. Smell of olive oil ruined the salad.

Ripping people off basically. Please kindly take business seriously if not passionately. The management is very poor and the description of their items is not true to its words. Iftar platter was terrible. So are the burgers, the meat was raw inside even though said to be grilled and their was no cheddar cheese given inside the Korean char boiled burger.
I had been there today for Iftar . The food was so cold,specially fried rice and salad was dry.Service person was not caring to the guest. very poor service. Management should concern about service.

At first , they forgot using salt probably :) 1) so far I know with my little knowledge, olive chicken is prepared using olive oil to fry the whole chicken n mixed up with some spices .I neither found any spice nor olive taste. 2) veg rice - hardly got vegetable, dried up rice , less quantity 3) egg ...: even an egg can taste this much worse , I didn't know , forgot using salt here also, as mentioned. 4) potato: the only thing I cud eat at least. Overall experience was worst, this dish costs 345 including Vat.I never hesitate spending if the quality and taste are satisfactory, but this place was irritating enough

Me and my wife went there on Baishakhi afternoon to take there Favorite meal (tk 499) meal platter during odd time. The platter was offered from 4.30 pm to 6.30 pm and we delayed our lunch just to have a taste of it. We thought to take the alternate options in our two platters so that we could have a chance to taste all the options. But when we went to order, the parser refused to give alternate options and replied that they do not take order for single platter. Even he repli...ed that if we ordered for single platter than they would refuse to serve so but it was not mentioned in anywhere in their flyer. The attitude of the parser was unfriendly. However we placed order. Then the manager came and roughly asked whats my problem. When i explained to him the issue, he became somewhat soft and said sorry. The food came. The rice and spaghetti became normal temperature and did not taste well. The mongolian beef and wrapped shrimp was good. Chicken mushroom was average. The special kulfi was good but not that much special... Overall FOOD was different, taste would be better if served hot, has areas of improvement.. Restaurant atmosphere and cleanliness was better.. But SERVICE is poor, promotional offers should be carefully designed, and the servers and managers should learn how to stay polite when they are in the wrong side of any debate... However I will go there/order online another day to get the taste of other items...

This is regarding dining experience at Tree House last night(18th September 2015).I am disappointed that I could not see through the reviews before agreeing to go for dinner with friends and a one year four month old.We waited one and half hours for 3 chicken steak meals and 1 beef steak meal(there was just three options to choose from).I personally feel pricing should include the 'experience' and interior for dining out,if that is so,the pricing is high because the place is ...really really really congested.There was this loud group of boys celebrating a birthday or something,but as common sense is most uncommon these days,the small space did not affect them to share incidents about their lives as loudly as possible.The staff maybe well behaved but the waiting time for food was so dispiriting(food was served as soon as we got up to leave) that there are no pictures to share.Also, if the food was extremely exciting that would have been a totally different story.Anyway,maybe it was a bad day for me or maybe my expectations do not match the common good reviews about this place,I will never frequent this place again.

Above all, the food quality was nowhere near the quality of the one in Rampura. only there ambience and the borhani compelled me to put a 2 star. otherwise I would have given a one.

I have been a regular consumer at KFC Gulshan 1 outlet. Today I have encountered a strange approach from the cashier. I ordered 2 pcs crispy Chicken meal. He was struggling to understand and eventually ended up giving two packs of fries. I told him that ordered the meal, there should be one pack only. Then he said you ordered 2 pcs of chicken. I explained it's the meal that I ordered. He was going back and forth... He seemed confused. I told a trainee standing next to him to ...call someone senior, the manager so that I can explain. She told the cashier instead. And he got agitated. He showed the fries pack and started saying you ordered 2 pcs chicken. The guy standing to him stepped in and took my order. He remained silent as he exchanged the cards... no thanks or apology for the confusion... nothing. To make it worse... he came upstairs after a while to clean up and kept exchanging eye contact couple of times. Don't want to put his name in public. Would be happy to inbox.

*** Negative review *** I was in love with Woodhouse Grill, seeing all their positive reviews and the amazing looking steaks. But all that glitters was just eye washing for us. We ordered one tomahawk, two sirloin and one t-bone steak. All were medium rare. And we rarely tasted steak like those. It was absolute raw and chewy like a tire. Only one sirloin steak came out good that means they can make the steak worth it's money but messed up with other three. After complaining t...hey heated that again but we were even unable to cut it . Highly dissatisfied and disappointed. Place - Wood house grill Food rating - 2 ( for that one steak )
Wasn't up to the mark, had better expectations. I took sauteed vegetables as one of the sides and the carrots smelled kind of rotten.
Meat was not properly aged and trimmed. So taste by itself was not upto the mark, accompanying sauces was bland and weak. Liked the people and price acceptable.
Expensive and steaks are not tasty
Very noisy place .... fit for teenagers
No comments you check by yourself. as when i m in dhaka some time i go there
Nothing to sayï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½
Wasted the money.............. will never try again.

I went to Woodhouse Grill on Friday and was shocked to see such a small restaurant with no space between tables. It seems the tables are joining each other. Their prices are quite expensive considering that this is a very small restaurant in a small congested space. The service was poor. We were told that the food would arrive 45 mins. after ordering but the food arrived later. I suggested the owner to serve all the food together at a time instead of serving each order separ...ately. We ordered a t bone steak medium well which was brought out medium rare with blood remaining inside. We also ordered a sirloin medium well which was very dry. The steaks are kept frozen and after cooking it was not at all juicy. We also ordered grill chicken which was ok. The waiters are not well trained and don't know when to serve the drinks which should have arrived right after ordering but instead I had to remind the waiter yo bring out the drinks almost 30 mins. after ordering the drinks. Its a ok place but they need to improve service quality and better quality steak.
I had the Tomahawk steak yesterday. It looked incredible but tasted disaster. Their service was good. Worst sauces ever I tasted. The place is too small and congested.

I had the Tomahawk steak last week. It looked incredible but tasted disaster. I asked for medium but they cooked well done for me. Their service was good as they cooked a new one but for my utter disappointment the second one was medium rare. Both the time the meat was really chewy and the mash was too sweet. The place is too small and congested. They should work hard on improving their cooking of the steak.

Went today during iftar time and ordered their iftar platter 1. They didn't serve panna cota which was included in the picture given in the page. In their list, there was fruit salad but they served two pieces of malta in the name of fruit salad. We ordered five platters but they served only three raita salads for each platters. I have been a regular customer of this restaurant and I can say that the quality of this restaurant is decreasing. The rice was not well cooked and vegetable was tasteless.

Had a bad experience at FoodBuzz banasree. Yesterday I went there with my family. As all the tables were filled up we waited for some time. They wanted us to give another table but there was no Air Conditioning there. So we had to leave the restaurant. Before leaving I told the incident to the man sitting in cash counter. But none of them simply apologized for it. Its only because of traffic jam and lack of good restaurants in banasree, we have visit such third class restaurants who do not even know what is customer service. This was my first and last visit to this restaurant.

Update about the Rating: This was one of my favorite place for hanging out with fnf. But faced something awkward and irritating in my last visit. Totally unprofessional behavior, if there's some problem to serve a specific item to me then it's better not to serve the same item to other while I am in your restaurant. I tried to order a specific item but the server said this item is not available, ok cool. I have gone for another item. but a Minute later I could see and hear t...hey were taking the same item's order from the next table. I didn't want to complain about the mismanagement at the cafe as some other visitor was there, I thought it would be better If I write it down to their complain book, so I asked for their complain book but they don't have a feedback or complain book. OMG. Rather the server insisted me to complain the problem to him directly, I denied and later the manager or accountant came to explain the scenario. Now come to the food part: I had ordered "Schezwan Chicken, Rice" and "Mongolian Beef" where the quantity was really poor and it doesn't even close to Schezwan Chicken's look or taste. Mongolian Beef's beef was hard to chew and again quantity was poor too. Old Rating: I will recommend this place to have the Fresh Juice and French Fries there. Reasonable price and comfortable couches to hang out with Friends. All the Other items I have tried need more improvement (Burger, Sub Sandwich and Regular Sandwich).

Outrageous increase in prices. Mejo options for Chas are gone. A cha will now cost 120. Add ons to Wraps have been reduces. The portions have decreased. This all with ever deteriorating service. Extremely disappointing that a store with so much potential of creating a difference is now becoming an undifferentiated commercial business. This WAS my go to place for lunch. (Mejo wrap and Cha). Will be looking at other options where 400 taka can be spent on food and service (and doesnt operate from a market with poor seating options given how much I have to spend).

The environment was so awful..... we went their for the first time so we didn't know how to place order n all but the waiters didn't cooperate....rather they were mocking and gossiping within themselves ......there were so much sound going on around.........i don't have a problem with the place being small and crowded with people, bt the service was so bad that I wanted to leave immediately.

The person at the payment counter called Biplob and person at wrap called Moinul are so rude.You won't get any service at all if you're here for two wraps.To get their attention you have to buy nine and have to put a lot of make up on your face.Moinul just refused to take my order and Biplob said that he can't provide me two cups of tea,whereas there was only two tables full of customers.I used to like this place a lot but they don't know how to behave and quality has also decreased.

Okay, here we go: We've been charged 350 for "imported milk" despite not asking for it. When approached your cash counter lady, it seemed apparent that this was intentional & she was dumb founded as someone actually bothered to read the receipt! To top it off she charged us for the free coffee that we were entitled to off the loyalty card. And when asked for a manager, her colleague presented himself to be the one..LOL! I am not sure because of where you are located, you feel privileged to rip off your paying customers & assume we are a bunch of idiots, or that we won't bother with your microscopic itemised "imported receipts!" I recommend you use a fund raising box if you are so desperate. At least we will know the local CafÃ© is not trying to take us for a ride!!! Gloria Jean's Coffees Bangladesh- it's a coffee shop where coffee tastes horrible and other dishes taste quite well. They don't even concentrate on improving the taste of the Coffees. They are constantly trying to improve other dishes which are easily found in other "restaurants". I repeat "Restaurants". Last I checked Gloria jeans is not a restaurant, it's a coffee shop. My question is- Has Gloria jeans become a restaurant or is it still a coffee shop? You guys are selling... deserts, fried rice, burgers and many other things very efficiently and they taste quite good as well. But when it comes to your coffee, they taste like shit. I have been going there for a long time and it's unacceptable from a great coffee shop like this one. I have been going to various coffee shops for a long time and that's how I developed a keen taste for Coffees. I know the variations of Coffees and the taste of them. In other coffee shops, the variations of coffee is quite amazing. Here one day I ordered "cafe mocha" and it tasted as usual. The next time I went there, I ordered a "cappuccino". I couldn't even differentiate between those two because both of them tasted the same. There is no depth and aroma in these coffees. If I can't find the variations among the different types of Coffees, then why the hell anyone should come here to taste these horrible Coffees with such high prices? They certainly maintain a standard about other dishes and they taste really good. But as a coffee shop, they don't deserve to get a rating of 1.

We were done with the chicken pop by 8 20 nd at 8 25 they sent the coleslaw nd burger. It looked terribly funny that yet they dint give the wings. What m i supposed to have the coleslaw with . Your head? I finished the burger at 8 35ish ns went to the counter asking them bbq wings kothay. They said 7 more mins. I said ill take take away nd asked them to take back their coleslaw. They agreed. But when they took it back the waiter said sorry aita khawa. I said impossible. U have to take it back. If necessary pack the wings with a mountain dew. But what will i do with ur ckoslaw served this late with burger. Keu ki burger diye coleslaw khabe. ? Ok finally they agreed again. When i was leaving with the bbq wings nd mountain dew. They offered a 25 tk exchange. I said keep it. And very rudely they said no i wont keep ur money. Take it. I angrily said i wont nf statted to walk away. 3 ppl near the kitchen screamed at me saying never come back. Now let me ratw ur food. Shake was ok. 9/10 Burger was disgusting. 2/10 Chicken pop was 5/10 Um yet to have the wings but ur horrible experience wont allow me to digest ur food. I am never coming back nd i know it wont bother you. Thing is. The person i went at your place with said quite a few times to go nf sit sumwhr nd i replied na its a good place naam shunsi. Baki gular naam o shuninai. I wont ask ppl not to go thr. I will ask ppl to go to ur place for some beautiful experience . Cheers. If the owner sees this. The food can be skipped. Please maintain behaviour of ur chef nd waiters.

I was very disappointed with your hyderabadi birayani. I ordered for my nani shashuri and she was really looking forward to having it since I raved so much about this restaurant. I am so embarassed. She tried a spoon and that is it. When I tried it, first thing I tasted was choon, like not kidding. Then the sweetness hit me so hard, I was pretty dumbstruck. I did order dosa as well, which she ate thankfully. But I am sorry to say, hyderabadi biriyani tasted like jorda with mutton pieces. Hope you will look into this matter. Thank you.

As I'm writing this review it's breaking my heart that my favorite restaurant's quality has fallen so much...the other day I ordered 'palak paneer and aloo paratha..n palak paneer was rotten...I informed you about that...n today I m at your place and we face almost same situation. We ordered 1 khichuri thali and one Naan thali and one chicken butter masala. ... 1) khichuri thali: shockingly there was a hair in khichuri! !! My pregnant sis was craving for your khichuri..we or...dered 2 hours before we reach tarka so that we can get the khichuri thali...and that's what she get??? Amazing! There was another time I got hair on my salad but I overlooked it..but today! !! Anyway. ..now the bhortas. ..whenever we ordered khichuri thali we got Taki machher bhorta. .. and today we got tasteless, flooded with mustard oil alu bhorta which we weren't informed before. .when my sis asked the waiter he gave a lame explanation that is 'amra ekekdin ekek bhorta dei' how come we never got any other bhorta!! Lameness er limit thake..if you ran out of food..you could inform us!!and the Kala bhuna...we requested that the last timewe orderedit was so hard that we could hardly eat..n today..it was just same!! UNEXPECTED 2) Naan thali: I ordered garlic Naan..they served plain Naan...when I complain they replaced it with garlic Naan..it it was hard and cold...though they heat it..it was hard...I don't know what happened to tarkas that Naan. ..which used to melt in mouth....everything in the thali was cold. ..daal was more like home made daal chorchori...n palak paneer. ..saltless. ..tasteless. ..it didn't even had the buttery texture it used to have....DISAPPOINTED 3)chicken butter masala : taste was good...but the ratio according to price is very very poor..I tried chicken butter masala before but I had no idea that your restaurant serves it with minced chicken. Anyway...your restaurant was our favorite place..but after having back to back horrible experience. ..my n my family quit...we are never coming back. ..highly dissatisfied and hurt. ..all the best

The vegetarian dishes were not edible. Though the chats like Dahi Fuchka and Papdi chat were good. Not a place for you if you are looking for a Indian vegetarian food.

Just walked out from your restaurant an will never ever step into your place. Me my mother and Khala come to have lunch every month. But your service turned out to be horrible. We stepped on there at 1:05. Ordered 6 dosa only. Told them that my daughter came Streight from school and we need at least 1 dosa early we waited for an hour. And walked out. In the mean time we saw ( as we sat in from of the kitchen door) a lady in burka , most probably she was one o your staff members and her son walked in to the kitchen. All your staff got busy entertaining her. And while we were walking out they dint bother to stop us. Only good food won't help you to go long way. Sorry.
lack of spicy food.. sob khabar e kemn misty misty. Mughol Chicken khete jeye misty te matha ghuray gese. :/
Over rated
Food is good...!!! but their service is not good n the food is also too expensive n very less quantity....!!!

I came to your place last week.Without a doubt your kababs and curry are very good but your falooda ruined all those.the falooda was too thick only full of thick milk and shabu, jelly and there was nothing to mix..no ice cream or doi. I really think you should work on it.I would not even pay 20tk for such a falooda and you charge 150 tk.
Probably one of the worst service level I have seen in Dhaka ...

i am being forced to edit the 5 star review to a 1 star depending on my recent visits.. my first visit there was indeed memorable but after that i have went there twice and every time left unsatisfied in terms of food quality and service. not gonna go into details i guess ppl who recently visited can relate very well.

Really bad experience. I ordered a masala dosa and pani puri. My wife ordered a beef roll. The food was taking a while so we decided to order some take away as well while waiting. The first served me the dosa while not serving anything to my wife. The dosa was hard like crystallized caramel! While we started eating the dosa we asked for the remaining orders. After about ten minutes they came back with the pani puri. I finished my meal while my wife was still waiting for her beef roll which arrived even after the take away food was ready. To add to all this misery regarding the service, the food was horrible. Not worth the time, anxiety, or money. Not going back unless the entire serving staff is changed or trained properly. The chefs need some training as well.

We had to wait more than one hour for food .. and later we asked for additional salad and they failed to serve that on time . ( Our food was finished by the time they served it) . About the food : ordered hariali kabab with garlic nan. Kabab was good but couldn't find any difference between garlic nan and regular one .

Khub e baje chilo pizza. 300tk ar chicken pizza niachilam. Khub e baje chilo taste. Double cheese Pizza te cheese chilo na tmn. Filthy place. Service khub e baje. Age pizza dice plat ar spoon dai nai. Onkkhon por onk dakadakir por plat ar spoon dice. Glass cock 30tk kore niache. Jeta khub e irrelevant lagche. Khub dirty ekta place. Pizza ar dam o onk besi niache. Food bank ar review dekhe gecilam. Manush je ki khaiya review dai jani na. Naki oder k valo serve korchilo. Naile paid review chilo oi gula. Mohammadpur ar pray sob restaurant a khaichi ami tao ekbar Na koyek hajar bar. Bt eto baje pizza experience life a first time hoiche. Whice was very frustrating to me. ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½
The taste of the pizza was very bad. Although they say the cheese will be more in chicken Supreme pizza, There was no cheese in pizza. Very dirty places.

1. The crust was really thin, almost like a Ruti. 2. Amount of cheese was not bad. 3. Among the toppings, tomatoes and onions were abundant, there was hardly any chicken even masroom in the chicken supreme pizza. You can also count the olives. 4. The overall taste was good but for 279tk, considering the toppings, it was overpriced. The making of pizza in an oven in front of you is the main attention. You can give it a try but not really a place to go back just to have the pizza. Definitely overhyped and overrated. Best of luck.

Their behaviour was bad, i repeat their "BEHAVIOUR" was "BAD". We wanted some change as we gave all of our "khuchra" tk at the time of order. But they didn't even have the courtesy to say politely that they didn't have any change, it was like we were beggars asking them for money. We ordered both chicken and beef, the amount of chicken was really poor, it was really a fancy cheese version of typical local pizza. So don't get confused by the price.
I have waited more than one hour still the food was not ready!

Their pizzas are just average. But behavior is quite extra ordinarily "POOR" we ordered 4 pizzas costing about 860. We paid them with 100 taka notes. But later on we wanted to give a 500 taka note instead of those 100 taka notes because it was urgent to have some changes. But, man o man they were like, "who are you?" even after explaining the incident the guy who was taking order didn't have the conscience to even say sorry. Frustrated with the behavior!!!!

Fine dining? eh? Very own app? Using some garbage 3rd party app that's not even built for a specific restaurant. Does not work properly. Has so many bugs. And finally, takes 5 minutes to place an order...and then someone has to accept it from Umai...which nobody does. 10 minutes wasted lmao. 25% discount if order through app? But only for one item in cart! Ordered Chicken Karaage. Came without any Soy sauce. Dry af tiny crispy chicken without any taste. Next up Umai Special Creamy Salmon Roll and another Salmon Roll. Big in names; tiny in sizes. Yuuuge in prices. Have had these types of foods in many other places but yours are by far the worse in taste, size but super high on the price. Your 1300tk stuff is worth at most 400tk. I don't mind paying 1.3k or even 2k for a few pieces of rolls. But the food quality has to match, right?

This is very disappointing when you go for unlimited maki offer provided with set menu A, but ended up waiting forever and getting only two maki pieces per person. Either it's a mismanagement or a deception.

We went for the iftar offer, bento box plus unlimited maki. By unlimited I guess they meant two maki pieces per person. We sat for an hour and waited to no avail. The quality of food wasn't that good either.

We went to Umai when it originally opened. It was pretty good. Over time, the quality has reduced tremendously. We just had food delivered at home - extremely poor quality and horribly prepared. Not edible by any standards. A complete and utter waste of money.

Tbh I was expecting more from UMAI.. Saw so many good reviews of this place! But in reality the food wasn't good! and the staffs were trained alright! Trained to deceive the customers! Bad Food + Bad Behavior! Also they seemed to behave differently with some guests.

Never thought I'd be THIS disappointed with Umai's food/service. The offer is exceedingly deceiving as it is called 'Bento with "unlimited" servings of maki rolls' whereas the restaurant isn't even prepared to serve more than 1/2 maki rolls per person throughout the entire time.
Sushi was not fresh. Tastes terrible. Great decor. But you should really focus on the quality and quantity of food. Not going back!
Food is awesome, quality is good & fresh .... Service is very good & presentable

Hello. My family as well as myself are very frequent customers at Lucknow. Sad to say, today was by far the worst experience I've had. The orders were placed to be taken away. 1. I've ordered a Beef Bhuna; now from my frequent orders, I know what to expect. It is always served cut in to little cubes. Today I got 2 bones and 2 chunks in the item out of which consisted of fat. This was never the case. 2. I've ordered for Chicken Butter Masala. Once I reached home I came to disc...over that it tastes different. I didn't bother checking the receipt before I left because Lucknow has never failed to reach my expectations, but when I did, it was listed Chicken Tikka Masala. 3. The condiments (salad and dressings) were missing. 4. The Naushijan Vegetable Biriani hardly had any vegetables other than potatoes. Also it was extremely spicy.

I visited few days back. The overall environment and decoration is very pale and sub-standard. The plastic chairs and dirty tables, unhygienic washroom and basin area ruined my taste for having food. When wished to try their chicken, I was told that it was finished though it was 9 pm only. The brinjal fry was burnt and was not edible at all. The dal was simply as good as that served in a street shop. And finally, the rice was of such poor quality that I can't even imagine even to serve this quality rice to my domestic servant. OK, I tried their firni also and I don't wanna say any more. A total wastage of my money. Determined not to visit ever.

After hearing a massive exaggeration about this place, went there for lunch. We wanted to try tacos but they said it's unavailable. Then we asked about nachos but they told us that it can be provided with beef only so finally we ordered Grind House Special Pizza 6 inches and club sandwich! And later...we repented for our decision....the pizza was burnt and tasted too bitter we couldn't even finish half! It was that horrible...and the sandwich was average...you can get that a...t any usual fastfood shop so I had to fill my tummy with two coca colas...moreover the place was too hot.. we asked why they aren't running their air conditioners and they said it's because of load shedding...come on you should take the necessary step to run one ac atleast! They were playing music on high volume so they could have the facility of running atleast one ac during power cut anyways I'm giving one star for their service...it was the only thing I liked about the place...had the wish to taste their Jambola Pasta but after having the pizza I wanted to run as soon as possible...sorry but greatly disappointed after hearing such high reviews OVERHYPED ! ... So... That's my girlfriend's review ... Lol... . xD So I spent 720/- for 2 Coca-Cola & a leftover burnt pizza... OH dear., Thank you.. -_- You are doing great .. Grind House.. Will never ever come again.. :/

went there yesterday. First of all, the way of approach was very disappointing. I planned to order student menu, stated on their page. But the waiter said, These are not available now! I asked him to consult it with his manager. He went and came back within a minute and said, they can, but it will take long time. What a strategy to inhibit us to order those set menus as they are relatively cheap in price! After that, I gave feedback to their manager and he said that, there's... The Fried rice was very good with a good smell. The diameter of the glasses were so less that it could held no more than 150-200 ml of soft drink. The last devastating and irritating thing was, they proposed us at least 5 times to give review on Facebook about their food! Why man? Isn't it my choice that I like to give review or not? Do you people have rights to insist? I felt shame that I brought 2 of my friends there. Like others, you people opened up a restaurant to do business and I appreciate that. But, do that with dignity. Had dinner with my family. Ordered appetizer platter, 2sopus, seafood salad, jasmine rice and redcurry. The waiter's behaviour was rather defensive and odd.. No customer services whatsoever. Extremely spicy food despite requesting that we have kids. They need to review their chef and staff
Totally disappointed seafood soup.

The worst Thai food ever! I went there five times to prove myself wrong, but the desi chef consistently served us worst possible food every time. First time I went with a friend and we tried a salad, rice noodle with prawn and finally a coconut ice cream. That was by far the acceptable ones, because we could at least finish eating. We have been fed with the lie that a Thai chef is working in the kitchen, whose big picture is proudly displayed at the entrance! From second time... onwards everything went wrong. Called the manager, who says he is looking into it and never returned. We asked the waiters who also disappeared and never came back. It is the third time we found out that their Thai chef has actually gone on leave two months ago, later found out he left four months ago. The current cook is a Bangladeshi who worked in Bangkok for many years. I am sure he never cooked Thai cuisine for Thai people. Probably worked sat ome desi restaurant in Bangkok cooking desi curries and bhartas! He is your so called â€œThaiâ€ chef currently preparing all the dishes singlehandedly. My God! Last time we went, we ordered a seafood soup in coconut milk and beef Panama curry. The soup was so sweet that we thought we are having coconut milk sherbet! The beef panang curry was also very sweet. My friend and I were so disappointed that we vouched that we will NEVER COME BACK to Absolute Thai. What an absolute cheating! Be aware!

The worst Thai food i have ever had in my life, We order sea food soup, and pad Thai,, Sea food soup was really bad and dont ask about the pad Thai it was horrifying,, Noodels were overcooked, overloaded with sauce, too much sweet, and very raw egg kinda smell.. They told us their chef is from Thailand,... If a Thai chef couldn't cook pad Thai in a right way then who else does!? Maybe that's he couldn't rise up his career in Thailand ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ and came to Bangladesh ï¿½ï¿½.. The waste of money but our pictures came out really well,, thats the only good thing about this restaurant.ï¿½ï¿½

Items were far less, not everything mentioned in the Iftar+Dinner buffet menu was there. When you are paying 1k++ for buffet and get only 18+ items to choose from you at least expect the taste to be spot on, but the food didn't taste good. They couldn't even get the fried rice rightï¿½. They claim to be an authentic Thai restaurant but their Pad Thai was the most disappointing dish out of all- It was noodle stirred in a handful of tomato ketchup and eggï¿½. Also, main and desse...rt items were finished by the time we were done with our appetizer and entree. And the most frustrating part of the dinner was the payment. In their facebook post, they mentioned if you pay through certain bank's card you will enjoy 20% discount. So, I decided to pay with my card, which belonged to one of their mentioned banks, but they gave me only 15% discount. When I let them know about their post, they demanded proof-which I showed them on my phone, but still they were firm and rigid on their claim.

The pad thai was basically boiled flat noodle tossed in sauce and scrambled eggs, no bean sprouts or any greens. The mango with sticky rice was horrible with the rice undercooked maybe because the rice was frozen before it was boiled or whatever. Coconut ice cream was ok but too sweet, the only thing good was the tom yam soup but really getting 1 out of 4 dishes taste right is just disappointing.

Itâ€™s been awhile since Iâ€™ve last been here. So, we decided to revisit. And man, how I regret it! The pad thai was so bad and so stinky that we decided to send it back. The only two things that were average was, the fried rice and the red chilli beef. Sea food green curry lacked the flavour and was smelly as well. Fishcake was to rubbery, chicken was basically an overdose of soya sauce. They had only one other table with a family of 5/6 along with us 4, yet my wife literally h...ad to shout â€œexcuse meâ€ to call out the waiter, at least 3/4 times. When I asked about if they had discount for credit cards, the waiter said no with a very straight face till I showed him that EBL signature cards are eligible for 15% discount on ala carte. He went to double check and agreed so. The only thing that probably stood out was they didnâ€™t charge us for the pad thai, which we sent back. Itâ€™s really sad to see a restaurant doing so good when they open and only in a matter of time everything deteriorates. Not going back unless they give me free tickets to Thailand!!!
Absolutely pathetic! Worst Thai food I ever had. Quality and taste deteriorated to the lowest level
Disappointing food. Ordered 22nd May at 12.01 am; they served 2am. Food was like direct from freezer.

Shocking, We tried earlier it was fabulous, this time with friends of early years tried to enjoy but really felt very much disappointed, other than the fish cake and chicken tempura every dish was below par (even it was cold like local Hotel) and finally the so called noodles had to changed after serving,

Went with a friend for dinner. totally starving after not having had anything to eat the entire day, after shopping. Decided to go for thai food. We arrive around 5ish pm today, there were only 2 tables occupied so of course we expected the service to be fast, but of course that was not the case at all. We ordered thai ice tea, tom yum soup, absolute thai platter, pineapple rice and pad thai. The ice tea too much milk, which ended up really sweet. Tom yum soup was utterly ...disappointing, too much coconut milk. The platter, the only ok, not even good, but ok in it was the fried prawns. The rest was obsolutely rubbish. Pineapple rice was not up to standard at all, the prawn was not fresh at all and the worst of them all which was not even edible and which probably made me and my friend sick was the pad thai, which seemed like it was a left over from yesterday. It had a smell. It was obsolutely rubbish. Worst thai experience i have had. We lost out appetite in the end. We only had a mouthful, paid and left. I felt sick and havent had anything to eat but a chocolate brownie from somewhere else hoping the taste would all be gone and my appetite will get back. But no, my appetite is completely lost. I wouldnt even give this a 1 star! Terrible experience and the service was terrible as well! There were a number of staffs with only 3 tables occupied, including ours however, we had to get up to get the bill as no one came when we called out for anyone! First and last time here. Not worth the time, the food and the money! Dont waste your money! Save the trip! Go somewhere else!

Big disappoinment :( Foods Don't have the wow factor ..just ok While ordered Coconut Ice cream , they served a salty yaak Ice cream and didn't even say sorry while we returned it . Oviously they took the full bill :)
I'm not a person who gives bad reviews but I suggest they change their name to Absolute Crap. The can of 7up though was amazing.. washed down the crap taste off my mouth.
Absolutely fucking disgusting food!!!! What kind of fucking restaurant did you guys open up to. I literally puked after having the fried rice!!! Ewww disgusting!!!!!!!

We had high expectations from this restaurant but I was highly disappointed. Absolutely none of the dishes we had were restaurant quality.

Worst service ever! They took 1 hour to serve the dishes! Food taste below average considering the price.never going back.

Horrible food. Absolutely tasteless. Probably the worst food I have ever tasted. Took beef with black pepper which was too salty. Then the item Thai Noodle with Prawn was just like eating plastic and was tasteless as well. This fried rice was OK. But the dessert item coconut ice was too much salty. And Mango sticky rice - you never ever going to pay for this awful food. When we called the manager and asked whether you have changed your cook or not? With a gentle smile he answered ''The main cook is going to join from 7th Feb'' I will give you some discount SIR since you did not like the food. Wahhh, what an answer!

Horrible service, substandard food, I'm never taking recommendations online ever again. I come in and the waiter asks me "kar kacche ashcchen?" What is that? He spills soup while serving and doesn't apologize. He bumps into the table while bringing the main and again doesn't apologize. When I'm billed, I see something in it I didn't even order. Also, the waiters keep hovering around like vultures the whole time as you eat.

Food was good... we ordered Prawn fried rice, seafood thai soup, beef with pepper and sweet and sour king prawns... apart from the rice (which was ordinary at best), everything else was good... Now the problems... the king prawns isn't really cheap, so one would expect equal sized prawns... but the restaurant does the same trick many other restaurants do, they give 2 actual king prawns and the other 2 is less than half the size.... our total for the food was 2200, which (if i...t was all inclusive) would have been perfect and amazing, and I'd have recommended it to my friends and would have visited again....however, the 15% VAT and 10% service charge took our total bill to closely BDT 3000... upon close calculation, we realised that the 3:1 rice which was 575 BDT would actually cost 718 including the ++ .... paying 718 Tk for 3 person rice feels ridiculous for even a 3 michellin star studded restaurant... similarly, water costs 65++ (BDT 80)... we went on a weekend and it was almost empty.... and I can understand why... despite the restaurant being really nice, not a lot of people would go there more than once... I hope the restaurant management realizes that and does something about it, because I'd love to go there again if the price becomes reasonable...
Food was extremely bad, they even charge a 3 year old baby, please don't go there.

The worst restaurant ever! The manager should learn how to behave with customers especially how to behave with a lady. We gave reservation for 10 people but unfortunately 2 of us couldn't show up. They charged for 10 people and when we went to argue the manager told me " i have never been to any good restaurant so i don't know how it works , all the good fancy restaurants take money for each reservation" and also said many disrespectful things. Never been this offended in my ...entire life. Restaurant is not about food it is also about the customer service. It seems the authority only wants one time customer, and want their customers to get insulted by their mannerless staffs. Its not about money it is about disrespect. Never going there ever , nor will suggest anyone to go. They need to be sued. RUBBISH PLACE TASTELESS FOOD

It should be called absolute rubbish! We had a booking for 14 persons. Unfortunately 4 people could not come. They said we have to pay for 14 people nevertheless. After negotiation, we had to pay for 12 people! Although the restaurant was half empty. The foods were awful and items were very limited and tasteless. Would never recommend to anyone!
Soup Was Good 8/10, Mixed Fried Rice And Green Curry Was Average 5/10, Environment 7/10

The worst THICK Thai Soup ever! Thoroughly disappointed with the watery consistency and bad texture! -_- If food is priced higher, it needs to taste better! If not, then it should be priced average, just like restaurants in every nook and cranny. Honestly, DISAPPOINTED!
Best statement of the day from you guys. "Amra berojdar der khawai na".

I never had such bad Thai food in my life and price was overwhelming. Do not recommend at all. I think the Thai Chef is on leave... Thai food lovers should try "Thai Emerald" in Uttara for authentic Thai Food. They are the BEST!
Terrible food! Ridiculous presentation. Imbalanced spicy application. Mosquito infestation and absurd front of house performance. Sorry guys but I thought you guys were would do much better.

Absolute Crap. Almost walked out after having an excuse of a fish cake, 'mama piaju' would've fared better. Somehow restrained myself to give the rest of the foods a chance. But alas, none of the foods looked appetising to start with; the rice & noodle were too sweet & the curries were salty. I didn't quite get from which angle this was Thai cuisine apart from some Thai spices & vegetation randomly thrown in. And apparently the chef is Thai. Well, I can imagine he was probably found selling Thai mama piaju on the streets of Thailand. Worst Thai food experience.

This restaurant has worst customer service. They made me wait for forty five minutes. We ordered tortellini ragu which is the worst pasta I have ever tasted. Even the steak and pizza was not up to mark.

Entered Spaghetti Jazz at roughly 2.45pm after calling them up to find out if they were open and where exactly the restaurant was. They asked us to order fast as they we gonna stop the kitchen operations at 3pm. We ordered 2 mushroom steaks. They were quick to serve the food. The grilled vegetables were good. Mashed potato was a little dry. Steak was dry and chewy. Mushrooms tasted bland. The waitress kept on hovering around us and handed the bill over to us not even halfway through the meal. She insisted we pay up the bill then mentioning that they were going to go on a break. At no point were the waiters/wiatresses cordial with us. Their attitude was outright impolite. We should have been notified on arrival that they were going to have a soft-close at 3 and wouldn't be able to serve us then. We would have been alright with that and left. Instead, they served us overcooked steaks and provided us the worst service I've experienced since 2013. To the Management: I am sorry but your steak was overpriced considering the quality and you really need to hire new staff. Alternatively you can also remove the service charge from your prices and make your employees work for the tip, who now get it regardless of how they treat your customers. The two stars I have given you is because of the grilled vegetables and the positive attitude of the guard with the beard; the only good things about our experience at SJ today. This is a very constructive criticism, please take note of it.

Went there with high expectation. The appetiser was okay but the main dishes were pathetic. There was some smell coming out from the steak and didnâ€™t like the flavour at all. Hope they will improve and give us the chance to say something good in the future!

Shawâ€™s Steakhouse in Dhaka is located in Gulshan 2, however is a major let down. First I wanted to go there for a dinner on the day before EID, since they had a promotion (discount plus free drink). I contacted the restaurant and confirmed that they are open. Unfortunately I went there then accordingly only to discover that the restaurant had closed already at 7.00 p.m. without prior notice. Nevertheless I agreed to give it a second try and went there once more today, only to... be even more disappointed. What I noticed immediately was that the restaurant was extremly empty, that though might have been to the early time of the day (7.45 p.m.). I would have loved to eat several of their items on the menu, but to my disappointment the majority of their items were unavailable. The issue started small, first one starter wasnâ€™t available and we asked for some more time to re-think alternatives. Shockingly the issue of them being out of items continued, for the next 7 (starters, salds, steaks, pasta dishes,â€¦ !!) items we wanted to order each time as an alternative. They each time said that the item would be unavailable or that they had run out of stock (for example Beef nachos was apparently already sold out). . but at 7.45 p.m. and only two other customers at the restaurant that seemed to be highly unlikely.. ironically enough they later tried to suggest that we take one of their more expensive platters which contained 4 of the items that they had told us before would be unavailable and rest only the most expensive items were available from the menu. It is evident to me that the restaurant which had a decent amount of potential is just being run-down and not properly managed and that must be the reason why there are no or hardly any customersâ€¦ (despite their social media presence being very professional).

Worst iftar cum dinner offer ever, went there with high expectations but was seriously disappointed by the food quality and specially the so called â€œsteakâ€. Is that what you call steak? Totally a deceiving place and severely overpriced

Hands down, worst pasta I've ever eaten. I'd go one step further and say It's probably the worst fast food I've eaten ever. Pizzas found in Cha Birir tong with a price tag of 25 taka taste much better than this. I ordered a naga baked pasta. It had 70% rubber, 29.99% oil and 0.01% chicken. Not even a single molecule of cheese. Literally there was nothing that can resemble anything close to cheese. There were in total 3 microscopic pieces of chicken. Taste: 0/10... Price: -inf / 10 ( I was charged 239 taka for this piece of crap. ) I get that it can be hectic before iftar and quality of some items might fall. But what I was delivered, was simply garbage. Unless someone's dying of hunger, s/he dare not touch this abomination.

Went to Pasta State Dhanmondi to have unlimited Pasta.... I had buffet and Unlimited meals at least 30-40 times in the last few years but this wast the worst unlimited offer.... Here's a short review~ So when I was entering the restaurant a guy was going out , he came back 1 minute after that and complained that a cockroach came out from his Pizza Box ï¿½ I saw the cockroach too.... Kinda lost my appetite there... They probably changed his pizza after that. After that we were w...aiting and the electricity went off, The whole restaurant was for at least 15 minutes so I am guessing they don't have a generator. Finally they served the pastas 20 minutes before Iftar... it was looking good to be honest... So after azan we started eating and the next experience is horrible... There was only cheese top layer... they just mixed mayonnaise with some boiled pasta and topped it with a lil bit of cheese and served it... At least 1/5th part of the bowl was full of oil ï¿½ I ate 20 huges slices of pizza in another restaurant last week so eating 5/6 bowls or atleast 3 bowls of Pasta is nothing for me... My friend didn't even try another bowl... I went for a second one and they said they don't have any more bowls to serve the pastas so they started serving in take away containers.... Btw ALL of the plates and bowls were broken (the edges) I couldn't even finish the second one... so I requested a waiter to pack it up for me so I can give it to someone on the street since it's Ramadan we shouldn't waste food ï¿½ They packed it up.... Almost everyone took their pasta in parcel because they couldn't finish it... (though it was an unlimited offer) They are serving their "Special Baked Pasta" only with Coke/Sprite~ Price : 345tk (including everything) Taste : 2/10 ï¿½ Environment : 5/10 Service : 5/10 I won't even recommend my enemy to go and take this order ï¿½ Really disappointed~

During last Saturday, I had Iftar cum dinner buffet at Bunkers. So guys, I am reviewing on the basis of only this; do not relate this with any of their regular platters. I had only tasted what was offered in that buffet menu. THE WORST BUFFET EVER I EXPERIENCED !!!... I am not writing this on anger. I let myself cool down, waited for than two days and were thinking where that went wrong; now reviewing. 1. If a restaurant offers buffet, it should be only buffet. No other regular platter should be offered during that time span. That creates a mess. They were offering buffet with every other regular platters. Hence, there place wasn't well designed and stuffs were not properly trained to handle such mayhem. 2. They offered around 30 items and to refill one dish we had to wait like 10 to 15 minutes; standing in a line. If you don't have enough structural setup and expertise to handle a house full of guests, why you guys offer buffet? 3. There were shortage of food. Usually people have spring roll with soup. They were refilling soup but spring roll was vanished; literally vanish after first round. When I asked, they replied (à¦¶à§‡à¦· à¦¹à§Ÿà§‡ à¦—à§‡à¦¸à§‡ à¦­à¦¾à¦‡à§Ÿà¦¾, à¦¸à¦°à¦¿). What nonsense is that? Do you guys even know what buffet means? 4. And there was an item of chicken covered with sauce (I forgot the name). That was good. I could grab 3 pieces and yet again, never refilled. According to their menu, they should have an item of beef, haven't seen it. A guest from the next table said that they gave a new dish, spicy chicken; I went and an empty plate was there. I complained and probably the store manager said (à¦¸à§à¦¯à¦¾à¦°, à¦¦à¦¿à§Ÿà§‡ à¦¤à§‹ à¦•à§à¦²à¦¾à¦¤à§‡ à¦ªà¦¾à¦°à¦›à¦¿ à¦¨à¦¾, à¦¦à§‡à§Ÿà¦¾à¦° à¦¸à¦¾à¦¥à§‡ à¦¸à¦¾à¦¥à§‡à¦‡ à¦¶à§‡à¦· à¦¹à§Ÿà§‡ à¦¯à¦¾à¦šà§à¦›à§‡). Dear that person, let me apologize for my language, but are you stupid? Do the math. Count the number of ovens you have, number of cooks in there, stuffs you have, estimate your food preparation pace, understand how many guests you can handle and over buffet for 5 less than that number. If you cannot cope up with the pace even once, you should be really really sorry. 5. And, now comes the topic of mighty PIZZA. Pizza wasn't included in the buffet menu they showed me but they were offering it. WORLD'S THINNEST PIZZA, I MUST SAY! :P Everyone must go and have a look; really astonishing. 6. Buffet time was till 9PM and most of the dishes were vanished around 7.45PM. People were starting to leave and around 8PM I left with the worst buffet experience in my life.

Last Friday we planned to dine out and headed to Pizza Hut at Dampara, Chittagong. We ordered for a large size cheesy bite pizza with chicken & other expected toppings, baked chicken pasta, fried button mushroom and cream of chicken soup. We were really shocked to find just a few tiny chunks of chicken as part of the toppings over the so-called pizza. Cream of chicken soup was also nothing special. By pouring little cream on a typical glutinous soup, you can't name it cream o...f chicken soup for your very kind information. Trust me, I had much better baked pasta at Da Signature in Chittagong and Shawarma House in Dhaka. Your baked pasta was awefully gravy when the cheese layer was taken off the top. Are you guys making money in Bangladesh by fooling innocent hard-working people down here? Are you ripping us off by using the brand "Pizza Hut"?

I order almost 2-3 times a week from Pizza Hut PHD Dhanmondi. I order pizza all the time but unfortunately I ordered the chicken mushroom pasta today which happens to be the worst pasta I ever had. No trace of white sauce, the use of slightly roasted onions was so much that it made me wonder if the main ingredient was pasta or onion. You guys just packed me a box full of garbage! Picture in the comment section!
One of the worst pizza i ever had in my life.Better you serve better food by increasing your price or better walk out from your business.Food is not always about price.Quality is important.

Pizza hut is a international chain restaurant. But in Bangladesh I donâ€™t think itâ€™s official anymore, because the service, food and environment wasnâ€™t like that what it is used to be 5 years back. Me and my wife went last monday the waiter who took our order was stupid. Soup was cold and they are literally cleaning the sealing even people are eating. Well bla bla bla bla. Transcom company should shut it off.

Seeking attention to the higher authority! Just been to baily road branch and the food was aweful. Specifically the topping and cheese were smelly on top of that waiter took my order wrong and over charged me so I complained and they kept me waiting while getting the numbers right. I left a complain feedback but I doubt whether it will reach to the higher authority ever. Disgraceful overall!

Good God! After enjoying meals in Pizza hut across the world all my life, I took my boy out during the school break for a treat. He ordered the "special" pizza... which turned out to be nothing remotely like what we're used to. Listen, seriously, I know this is Bangladesh and all and you're trying to cater to the native palate but **you don't have to**... pizza hut is now off our list of places (for me and my wife and my son - hat-trick - perfect) because of this monstrosity they served us. If I wanted a Bengali pizza from an American chain (on home ground), I'd head down to my local Habib Hotel and order their curry and rice. It was hideous. The product development team need to stick up a reminder on their desks, "If it ain't broke, don't fix it!" Meanwhile, I shall be taking my wallet somewhere where I get a pizza when I order one.

I ordered pizza by Food panda. the worst ever i eat. this is iftre time guys. my family didn't told me anything. they send me two pizza. it was buy 1 get 1 free offer. but there is no cheese (what we expected). bread was too much dry. after the iftar, in night i baked extra slice in oven and what??? it looks same as a "pauruti" with some onion :( ...sorry pizza hut. please do something good, because you have good reputation in pizza. :( sorry for poor rating.

To the authority, I have been a dedicated customer of Pizza Hut for more than 5 years. Your pizzas and service has always intrigued me. However, recently I have seen you charge high "exclusive" VAT and Tax rates for the products. For example, you are charging VAT and Tax for buying soft drinks from your outlets at high rates (BDT132/- VAT+Appl SD for Cheese Lovers and one Mirinda worth BDT 548/- total). Another case: BDT 104/- VAT+Appl SD for a meal worth BDT 699/- I want to know the reason behind this increase. Regards, A Dedicated Customer of Pizza Hut who is loosing faith in the services of the brand.

I used to be very regular at Pizza hut. Recently I had been to pizza hut, gulshan outlet. The service and food quality had been degraded so much I had no idea. I used to keep on calling for attendees, keep asking for services but it took a lot of time to seek their attention. For payment they took my card and no one returned it back. I had to rush to other waiters to find out my cards. Then managers had to come to sort out problems. I had never faced such service. Very heartbroken with the carelessness. Also the taste of food changed drastically. I really don't know is there any reason left I will ever visit there. very much disappointing.
Please make sure that all yours outlets have the actual real offers. And updated all the offers at the web. And do not make people Harris and at list try to keep your company reputation well. Thanks

Today I tried the chicken arrabbiata pasta from your Bashundhara outlet. The pasta was absolutely disgusting! I know it is not right to criticize food this way but the food you served tasted so bad. Such a waste of money. There was no cheese and the pasta was undercooked. No wonder this particular outlet is always empty.
plus some food remains Unavailable through out the month

Worst unlimited pizza offer ever. You have to order everytime and wait 15 mins for pizza to come. They serve medium sized 1 pizza everytime, which takes less than 2 mins to finish. This is pure rubbish. Please stay away from this trap. Waste of money.

The cheesy bite was dry. Ektuo moja na. No capsicum or chicken was present. Cheese er balai o chilo na. Pura dhoka. I ordered red and hot cheesy bites. Homedelivery niye chilm. On store hole khub boka pawna chilo. Ja Mon chay ekta banay 1634tk nichche. Ami radhtei pari na shei amr hater pizza o er theke hajar moja. Nam diyeche cheesy bites but in reality it should be garlic bun bites with ekdm moja na toppings. I'm soooo disappointed. I was really hoping something good, seeing their advertisement. I need a lower star rating to rate this place. When pizza hut came to bangladesh it was simply the place to be. I remember i used to love them so much i went there at least once every 2 weeks. Not anymore.

Dear Pizza Hut.!!! I think I had lost my mind .... thats why I went to your outlet and gave my phone number at counter..... Anyway please forgive me & do not ... I repeat do not send me your daily painful promotional massages. Please dont.

I wish I could rate them -0! To. Be honest they don't deserve that! I used to think Pizza Hut is an outstanding food chain but they proved me wrong! Called them nearly 8:35 pm for placing an order , 1st receiver told me to call after 9:00 pm as they can't TAKE order then! Who does that? Anyways, next Time I called, they told me that they can't delivery to Jigatola. Was surprised! I told him that I ordered from my present address before. He said it's impossible to deliver to... my address and hung up! After today's experience I was feeling like showering the Pizza Hut delivery management team with all the galis I know:) On which basis Pizza Hut recruits those bloody idiots who don't even know how to serve their customer? How to talk to them? Never expected this, Pizza Hut can be so damn unprofessional!!!!!!!!!! If you can't deliver to a certain area you must announce that! Never ever going to place an order from them .

This place WAS amazing for 5-6 years straight till last year. Currently no one knows the actual status of its international franchisee license and clearly they don't care about the quality of food anymore. There used to be a time when this was country's only place for pizza and pasta. As many good competitors have risen up now, you don't have to eat the DRY, RUBBERY pasta, and TASTELESS, generic pizza they serve, not anymore. The well behaved waiters they have is a feeble attempt at justifying the ludicrous food they serve for the high price they charge.

The meatball pasta was awful. Zero spices. No sauce. The pizza was marginally better but cold. Never ordering again. They took more than an hour to prepare the food. If you can't handle a lot of orders at a time you should not give such offers. Waste of money.

I ordered an Italian Deep Dish pizza tonight through HungryNaki. It was supposed to be 12" but it seemed smaller, but I didnt whip out a scale to measure. There was no Beef ham, Bacon, Pepperoni, Onion or Capsicum. The depth of the bread was not filled, essentially making it a non deep dish pizza. The marinara was salty and the cheese was stringy. It might be the worst pizza I have ever had. Funny thing is the quality wasnt this bad before, they had a pretty amazing deep dish pizza. But what I got tonight, I wouldnt even feed my dog. Pathetic.

I didnt like the ambience and their ac didnt work at all it was all warmed up and the damn waiter said it was in 16 degree !!! Actually it was in 25 degree ( with heat mode) along with the spicy pizza !! And the waiter didnt serve me at all ! It was unlimited offer we took but he served me only 2 slices!!! He didnt have the decency to offer me any 3rd slice !! He served all of them in the same table not me! I didnt bother to ask him ! He was an idiot ! The money is not worth it at all I will not recommend anyone to visit you guys again.

i went today around 18:30. most probably a party going on.. I used to like visiting this cafe but yesterday's experience has made me determined never to visit the place again. I was there with friends and each time my friends wanted to order something, the waiter countered asking them to order someone else. For example, a friend ordered Thai chicken, and the waiter said to order grilled chicken. Another friend ordered chicken pizza and the waiter said to order seafood pizza. These are just 2 examples. The entire fiasco went for more than 15 minutes. And the waiter wasn't even suggesting alternatives. He was blatantly saying, no try the other one. I was extremely pissed with the service and never going back there again.

Our experience was pretty bad. They seemed new. Most of the foods in their menu were unavailable. They even gave excuses like "our fridges were down, so we can't prepare the milkshakes". The service was really bad. The waiters were rude. Apparently the platters are limited, so we could only order platter 1. They served with missing ingredients. After calling them a million times, they came and added the missing ingredients. Also, the platter says 3 dates but they provided only 1. Not that it matters, but at least don't mention the quantity if you can't deliver. The vegetable and the Dory fish batter had hair. We were so pissed off and there was no time to change, so we just didn't bother to let them know or anything. The food was mediocre. Nothing exceptional. The service and the hair made the experience worse. Highly disappointed. We are paying for good service and good food. The least they can do is not serve unhygienic food and be nice to us.
Very overpriced. food not so good. service very slow

though the ambience of the restaurant and the taste of the food was more or less good, but the quatity of food is horribly less according to the price. we were around 4 people and we ordered a mixed seafood platter worth around 500 tk.. each platter almost contained 4/5 pieces of mushroom, 3/4 pieces of small calamari, 2 pieces of shrimp, nd e few pieces of chicken. the platter was hardly even enough for one person. you should look into the matter.

I couldn't taste any food, because of Thok Baji: Platter er food item main Menu te achhe. Main Menu er food order korle dite parbe ... Kono shomoshsha nai. But platter dite 2 hours plus late hobe !!!
