Thanks
Food is good can't deny that but their service on the other hand is very bad. Called them up to know whether they have the platters and upon arrival they denied.

Firstly they threw a offer but on arrival platter 1 is run out, taste of food & soda is major disappointment. Till now no card payment is accepted & 10% service charge is final disappointment, though environment & behavior is good.
Sad. Ordered Creamy Dory but gave us another dish bcos they don't have time as they have a big order to handle lol. Had to wait 40mins for food. Service was poor. Interior is great. Food was average.

IF U WANNA WASTE UR VALUABLE MONEY BEHIND SOME AWFUL CRAPS (Seafood according to them). Worst possible experience of so called 'seafood'. Overpricing is never am issue if the foods are good and a sense of satisfaction is there in mind. But this unprofessional guys with worthless chef is literally awful. The pics came good on cellphone but dont be misguided by those or the ambience/ interior of the resturant. After sitting over there, we were surprised to see the emptiness of... At last they said they dont accept cards !!!! Coz their owner is not brining the machine from banks ..!!! (Are u kidding me ??) Food: 3(Max)/10 Environment: 8/10 Price: 5/10
Worst food ever they didnt serve fresh food which was cold and smelly. Never going to that restaurent
It was not food actually, it was a punishment for me. Grow up. People prefer tasty food more than your interior.
Bad food, over priced, did not deliver according to the menu and waiter lacked in training
Service WORST WORST WORST ..... food average.....

1 hr por ese bollen hobena. valo laglona beparta :(

We went at around 1 pm, and a little later the waiter told us the food would be around 20 minutes late. This was supposed to be brunch, so we asked them to serve us some food which would come fast, while we waited for the rest. They told us the prawn dim sum would be served in 5 minutes, but it came 20 minutes later. After an hour and half, around 2:30pm, we still hadn't been served anything else! We told the manager that we'll only take any food which they could serve by 2:30, but they failed to serve us our orders even by then. We paid for the dim sums and left ravenously hungry, with no apologies from the manager. Apparently there was some owner's brunch which caused this unacceptable delay! Worst service ever.

I love Chow's dumplings but the price I pay for includes food n service both. We went for a friend's birthday last month n ordered the lamb from the main course (as I had it before n I liked it). I put a piece in my mouth and found the lamb totally cold. My friend thought that the dish has to be served cold but as I mentioned that I had it before. So, I called the waiter n told him about it. He took away the dish right then and came back with explanation - "the chef went out ...of the kitchen so the other person in charge prepared the dish and he forgot that he didn't warm it." We are paying this price to have refrigerated food??? The manager came to say sorry n served us complementary brownie but how can it replace the fact that they serve cold food from the refrigerator. I have never seen the management write a reply to any of the reviewer so I wonder, does it really make any difference to them?
horrible....price wasn't justified with the quantity of food..so was the taste ï¿½...and really dissappointed.

I was impressed by the decor but was disappointed soon by the food. Food is overpriced and bland. The quantity of each item was very small compared to its high price.I had better dumplings in Dhaka. The chowmein was chewy, leathery and cold. I didn't find any Cantonese flavour in any dish. Even the iced tea was very bitter. The service was very slow and poor. I didn't expect such poor service and bad food from a high-end restaurant like Chows.

A complete disappointment, most of the food we ordered was left uneaten as it tasted stale and unappetizing , the prawns we ordered tasted mushy and had a funky flavor, as did their whole fried fish and fried rice, not at all what you'd expect from a premium establishment. Do not recommend and definitely won't be coming back.

Was extremely disappointed with the service yesterday. We went there for brunch and waited for nearly 1.5 hours and yet the food was not served. Whenever we inquired about the order, they kept insisting that the food would be out in 10-15 minutes. Eventually we got up and left. The staff needs to be given a training on customer service (try getting a crash course from the staff at Izumi)!

I made a reservation for four at 2:30 pm yesterday. I was there on time, however, my friends had reached a few minutes prior to 3:00 pm. Before they could make themselves comfortable, a waiter insisted that we order at once, since apparently their kitchen closes at 3:00 pm. We did, and waited for 40 minutes (which they asked from us) for our food. Immediately after we finished, our waiter had gotten us the bill before we even asked, and said that they were to have a staff pa...rty- an implication that we leave. The food was good, but not out of the world. Therefore, from such a high-end restaurant, service at-least is well desired from a customer's end. Provided the place would be overcrowded (or even close to being crowded) on the occasion of Pohela Boishakh, I would have understood. I'm afraid that many other reviews well portray how they tend to serve their customers.

We availed the buffet iftar,dinner. But the iftar was set menu and dinner had only 5 items including rice & chowmein moreover the taste was average. I don't know about their regular menu but the buffet was not good.

Serious lack of cordiality comparing to the other places I have visited within last few days.. If u want to have good Chinese food find an alternative restaurant.. Interior is beautiful and a dimsum probably named prawn chicken Sui mai tastes good, the ginger drink was good but such a small amount was given
nothing special.... so so... we went two times but food was not that tasty according to the price...and recent days food served cold in many restaurants, don't know why??

I had to wait for almost 1 hour 40 mins for dinner today. While we were leaving without having food, the owner lady stopped us and took care of the rest. This is not how a well known dining works. They must work on time.
Just horrible. Never coming back here again. ï¿½
Ambience and service was good but food was overpriced considering the taste and quantity! Really disappointed!
Food was cold .... and they gave us congested table... ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½
The food was below average and the service was absolutely horrible.
Except the decor nothing is good ...waste of money perusing authentic Chinese cuisine
The food was below average, but given the price it was a waste of my money.

Their iftaar is too much expensive and the quantity is very much disappointing. Here in BD we can avail the Buffet ifter along with dinner in Tk 1800/1600 or even in 1200 , where the Chows iftaar ( one plate set ) is 1400 and ++ goes to Tk 1700+. I don't know why they have chosen the Ramadan for their plunderage and we are encouraging them by taking the part of that dishonesty !
They are most arrogant in attitude... everyone should stop going there until thet beg pardon openly......

Food is honestly good, but i only rate 2 stars because your credit card line wasn't working!!! A restaurant if this stature and prices should expect to have redundancies for credit card/debit card processing facilities.
Very poor Service .... This restaurant dnt know how to deal with their customer ... People who have enough time and prefer to eat cold food thn this is the right restaurant for them..

Waited an hour and a half for cold food and the waiter was very rude. There were 3 kids with us and he claimed our order was "poor" for 9 people. We asked repeatedly for the manager who never came. No discounts or apologies. The table opposite us was so furious with the service they yelled and did not touch their food and left. 5 of us said we would never come back.
Horrible service. The server forgot to bring two of our ordered items not once but twice! I was very disappointed.

we went to Chow following much hype regarding the food and so forth. Unfortunately turns out as following (1) waiters are very poorly trained regarding assistance during placing order and also hearing out on table preference. (2) food is not of much good/better taste then of recently opened other similar restaurants (3) Waiter's advice on the portions were HORRIBLE Highly discourage visits to Chow not only for the service but also for the taste of food.

Going through your Facebook page, nowhere does it say that you have to make prior reservations. My husband and I went to Chows on Friday night, and we were literally turned out because we had no reservations! I see from one of your reviews that another customer had the same complaint. This level of customer service is unacceptable! As a regular food connoisseur, I'd suggest that you teach your staff customer relations because no amount of glitz and glamour will get you loyal customers if your restaurant has abominable customer service!!!

I made a reservation at Chows and went their with my foreign guests. Went I called them to reserve a table they told me that the last order was at 3pm however they will consider my foreign guests and still serve us lunch after hours. When I went there with my guests they literally shut the door on our face and refused us to enter the restaurant. They should have never accepted our reservation if they were unable to serve. They don't have basic human decency. I even told them ...that my Chinese guests would just like to look around even if they cant serve us lunch. Still they shut the door on our faces. How can they be so rude to customers when they will have no business without us. I sincerely advice them to learn how to operate a restaurant and teach their staff basic manners. There are number of Chinese restaurants in Dhaka so don't think that your restaurant is any special.
Food was tasty, but they cheated with price & discount :(
Today I told them about the 2 burnt sandwiches they gave me and one of them said "pona na to oita crispy". Rating -10.

We were interested to try out their 'Ramen with Chicken Steak and Boiled egg'. We visited their Dhanmondi branch today during lunch time and then the waiter said that, they are not offering this item. When we asked why, then he arrogantly replied to us he doesn't know why and it is their management decision. We found it very unprofessional because of their attitude towards us as if they don't care and on the otherhand, they are constantly promoting their restaurant in social network. Never going back to this restaurant again!

For the first time, I ordered Iftar Platter from HungryNaki! And I didnâ€™t receive two items that were mentioned in the meal list. There was no chicken wings and no drink along with my parcel. What a waste! Food was average but it was incomplete to have iftar without drinks ï¿½! Should I ask for a refund? ï¿½

When u provide food it's your responsibility to provide good food. As we paid for the food. Today rice and noodle came to our uni nsu but i must say it was just a waste of money. It's cold and not spicy at all. Thn while eating I found a piece of broken plate on my food. I have nothing to say..........

Not a good place for hangout.Food was not same as mentioned in picture.Food taste average.Very tiny place and need to leave place just after food as they pushing.Price is high comparing to food. Not coming again may be.

I went to your Banani outlet today.. I had the horrible experience of all. You claim to give buy 1 get 1 free offer which means that the food should be enough for four but it wasn't enough for hardly three. Plus you couldn't even give the dishes mentioned in your chart. If you can't provide the exact thing then you should say that. I was so embarrassed in front of my friends. Plus the beef dish you offer was full of onions and tomatoes, the quantity of beef was too low.
Salty salty salty food. Even the green chili sauce was too salty.
Not good . taste was worse in rice and noodles I have ever eaten.moreover expensive without reason .
faltu,testless,worse food ever I ate there.they don't deserve even 1 star

I had dinner with set-B yesterday. The same menu I tasted few months back. This time food taste was rubbish. I shared the experience with manager and he said old chef has move to their Uttara branch which may cause it! As a compensation they gave me 10% discount but I couldn't do my dinner properly and had to take away all foods.

Bogus food, worst quality service with terrible dirty environment. Wasted good amount of money for nothing.
I lv ur food,it was gd enough

We ordered Mee Goreng Noodles, General Tso's Chicken, Chicken dumpling. The mee goreng was good. General tso's chicken was so so. The worst was the chicken dumplings, they smelled so horrible and was hard to chew on and anyone would know they were bad. We ate 1 out of 6 and informed the staffs about this. And then after 5 minutes gave us the same thing again. When we complained again they admitting that the seasoning was probably bad. Worst of all, they billed us for it! What the heck??!! If they keep doing this, they will run out of returning customers very soon.
Worst experience ever...never gonna go there again..
Had buffet iftar today. Unfortunately... food didn't match with my expectation!
the first and only time i'm going there. the food was terrible
good ambiance... with.... tasteless food ... so not going again :/ :/

Went there for lunch today: Environment is so so. Sitting arrangement as well as sits are not comfortable at all. Don't know who are their target customers. Ordered set menu 2 for four. Food was ok type. But prawn pad thai was the worst. It was crap. The chef/cook has basic problem of cooking process of Pad Thai. He needs trainig. Initially pad thai (rice noodles) was boiled in less amount of water. So it's got sticky. And not stir-fried. In addition amount of fried rice was not good enough for 4 person. Overall rating is 2 out of 5.
Shittiest food i ever had...they should offer orsaline free wid every meal :3 never going there
utter disappointment....
The most terrible food i've had in a long time. They couldn't get a single dish right. The food was either too salty, or too tangy, or just tasted bad. Never going back.

The food was terrible. The saving grace was that it looked good, but thats all . The stir fried beef in sesame oil had buckets of salt, so much that we had to send it back. The general tso's chicken tasted like bits of chicken in tamarind paste. The service was good considering we were the only two customers in the entire place. And now we know why. Most of the food was inedible, however they didtry to fix the beef dish but the result was just weird tasting sugary over salted beef.

I've been a huge fan of this place since it opened doors a few years back in Banani..however my recent experience has not been too well..i was served stale 'tokyo fried rice'..i was disappointed that they even served it..i had eaten half of the rice, and they later replaced it..but i was through with dinner, so didnt need the replaced rice..its just a disappointment that after a while people start compromising with quality once they get established. kindly address this issue, and try not to compromise with the standards which YOU have set yourself!!

The people of Tokyo Express have turned to thievery these days. It was bad enough that the service has gone to hell and that the food portions have decreased in size, they have also turned to stealing your food. Went there today with the family and there was a lot of food left over so we asked them to pack it for us. Got home and saw that all the left over sushi was not there. They didn't pack it. Packed everything else but the sushi. Really disgusting to think that they either ate it or they were going to serve it to the next customer. Really appalling Tokyo Express.
Ordered Udon. Got no broth.

We had a really bad experience today in tokyo express.. we go there at 4/ 4.30 .they said we have to order food now..coz there Break time will be started right now.. that's why we ordered as early as possible.they also surved it quickly.. after finishing our meal.At that time there kitchen was close nd break time was started for the staffs.. so cleard our bill.nd started taking some pictures.when we cleared our bills at that time they just turned off all the lights of the res...taurant... At that time we r taking pictures they told us nothing bt turned off lights ac even also closed the door..just got shocked by their behavior.what kind of bad Manner is this?? I never face this kind of behavior in my entire life..no courtasy atall..we pay a handsome amount to eat there.nd they can't behave like this.. i really feel insulted... I think we will also give negative review for ur staffs mannerless behavior

Worst ever experience of dining out at Tokyo Express in Gulshan! With high expectations I took my daughters to have dinner tonight there.I wish I never had gone there . I have tried almost all of the renowned restaurants in Dhaka but this was a nightmare.The service is horribly bad, food came late beyond one can expect Finally when it came, the main dish we crazed for never arrived. We just waited to see what was happening.It wasn't served till the last! Amazingly when the bi...ll came, we were charged also for the dish we never had. The person serving was most inexperienced, ill mannered & paid no attention to our needs. We don't eat free, we pay a lot of money for eating out. I will also complain to the CAB for such managements! The owners of Tokyo express should be more careful in providing services to their customers . I shall never ever go to this place and would highly recommend everyone to think not twice but many many times before going to this restaurant. I had terrible experience tonight ! Thanks to Tokyo express!!!!!

I ordered take away Firstly this afternoon before Juma I try to order 2 classic bento box They said come after 2pm Than we can serve you Only after Juma... I came all the way from Dhanmondi I placed my order again over the phone They confirmed that come in 10mts It will be ready But when I reached and settled my bill Now they ask me to wait for 10 to 15mts This means they are placing my order now I don't understand why they committed the time line And being so regular and loyal to Tokyo Express This service is unbearable Management put ears to the complaint Otherwise you will be history Service and Timing matters ....... You are not the only option in town !!!

I had a really bad experience today in tokyo express.. we go there at 4/ 4.30 .they said we have to order food now..coz there Break time will be started right now.. that's why we ordered as early as possible.they also surved it quickly.. after finishing our meal.At that time there kitchen was close nd break time was started for the staffs.. so cleard our bill.nd started taking some pictures.when we cleared our bills at that time they just turned off all the lights of the rest...aurant... At that time we r taking pictures they told us nothing bt turned off lights ac even also closed the door..just got shocked by their behavior.what kind of bad Manner is this?? I never face this kind of behavior in my entire life..no courtasy atall..we pay a handsome amount to eat there.nd they can't behave like this.. i really feel insulted... I think we will also give negative review for ur staffs mannerless behavior

Tokyo has been one of my very very few favorite places from the time they started but what i have tasted recently has left me utterly disappointed. Firstly the rice, tokyo's fried rice tasted amazing itself but the rice tastes like "norom bhaat" i even found few "shada bhaat er dola" did you change the rice or something because the rice tastes plain disgusting now! second, the spicy osaka beef tastes rubbery and seems like the only thing used to cook the beef was soy sauce and nothing else. The nanban doesnt even taste the same. the jumbo prawn tempura was the only saving grace! i really hope the management looks into this! this is extremely disheartening for a loyal customer of yours such as me.
Food was not bad.... But after finishing my main course they asked for 30 minutes to deliver my desert after asking 3 to 4 times and I had to cancel the desert...didn't feel good.
To me the overall experience was not that good, specially the ambience of the restaurant is not up to the mark.
Overpriced. Quality of the food and the amount did not meet expectation. Would not recommend.

Was expecting a great service; after getting recommendation from quite a few friends. Shortage of Miso soup (really? In a Japanese restaurant? REALLY?) The ramen (not really but let's call it the name it was given by the restaurant) came last even though we asked for it first. Also poor choice in music (over remixed pop; c'mon it's 2017), trying to compensate for it by turning it to a deafening amount of loudness. Poor service overall. It's cold in here. I won't recommend coming here but if you do, bring a jacket or a shawl. MOSQUITOS EVERYWHERE. I MEAN EVERYWHERE. IT TOOK ME 25MINS TO WRITE THIS BECAUSE IT'S SO LOUD I CAN'T HEAR MYSELF THINK !!!!!

I'm never going to sbarro baily road or in any branch or sbarro again. Loss of money and disrespectful to my tastebud.
Worst pasta at baily road outlet. Overpriced, small portion and tasteless. 1 out of 10. Staff behaviour was good. But that is not enough to go back again!

Had worst experience at khilgaon branch today. Pizza crust was damn hard, hardly any cheese. Ice lemon tea had no ice, when asked for ice told that ice is finished. Wedges were 8-9 pieces only and we had to wait for this shitty foods for more than an hour. Waiter forgot what we ordered and around half hour later came to us and asked what we want again! We were much excited, as Sbarro opened new in Khilgaon. But if this the service and food quality, no need for it here.
we ordered for 8"inch pizza but they gave us 6"inch pizza. The taste wasn't really good enough and their pizza was less cheesy which wasn't expected either

Worst sehri-outing experience I had till date. Yesterday afternoon, I called up the baily road branch and reserved seats for nine people. The staff member who talked to me had confirmed and assured me that the reservation was placed. At 2:15 AM when we actually arrived at the restaurant, we got to know that this reservation was never communicated to the sehri shift staff member. Kudos to them for their great professionalism :) But this was only the start. They served us the first plate at 3:27 AM, a mere 11 minutes before the sehri deadline. We waited for more than an hour thinking that okay they didn't communicate the reservation among themselves but surely a franchise like Sbarro will be able to serve up some platters in 30- 40 minutes. We were dead wrong. Even after taking such a long time, they didn't serve the full platter. Barely half of the offerings were plated in front of us. Sadly, all these things weren't the most pathetic part of the experience. This sham of a restaurant they are running didn't even have spoons! Yes, a restaurant without spoons. We had rush-eat rice with a fork and a knife. With 11minutes till the sehri deadline.

Every time itâ€™s raw inside.For a chain shop like this where we are paying a lot and getting undone food this is just not done.Sbbaro was one of my favourite place but for these bad services I donâ€™t think I will ever dine in there.You should do something with your service.

Had worst experience at khilgaon branch today. Pizza crust was damn hard, hardly any cheese. Ice lemon tea had no ice, when asked for ice told that ice is finished. Wedges were 8-9 pieces only and we had to wait for this shitty foods for more than an hour. Waiter forgot what we ordered and around half hour later came to us and asked what we want again! We were much excited, as Sbarro opened new in Khilgaon. But if this the service and food quality, no need for it here.

Worst sehri-outing experience I had till date. Yesterday afternoon, I called up the baily road branch and reserved seats for nine people. The staff member who talked to me had confirmed and assured me that the reservation was placed. At 2:15 AM when we actually arrived at the restaurant, we got to know that this reservation was never communicated to the sehri shift staff member. Kudos to them for their great professionalism :) But this was only the start. They served us the first plate at 3:27 AM, a mere 11 minutes before the sehri deadline. We waited for more than an hour thinking that okay they didn't communicate the reservation among themselves but surely a franchise like Sbarro will be able to serve up some platters in 30- 40 minutes. We were dead wrong. Even after taking such a long time, they didn't serve the full platter. Barely half of the offerings were plated in front of us. Sadly, all these things weren't the most pathetic part of the experience. This sham of a restaurant they are running didn't even have spoons! Yes, a restaurant without spoons. We had rush-eat rice with a fork and a knife. With 11minutes till the sehri deadline.

Heard a lot about Sbarro, but never went there in last 2 years. When I saw the opening post (after the BESTever QR Code campaign and BEST quality Facebook post design), I, along with 3 other friends went to the Asad Avenue Outlet. As it is the soft launching phase, so I am not judging them based on their service. This is all about FOOD QUALITY. The crust was as thick as pillow (à¦¬à¦¾à¦²à¦¿à¦¶). The closest competitor in terms of crust thickness would be Captain's World (which I had ...when Ashraful was our Cricket Captain and always regretted before today). Apart from the crust, the pizza was TASTELESS. Maybe you might think I have too Bangali a taste bud, but I never wrote bad review about any place. Yes, I have never been to NY but I have been to Europe 2 times. I am this furious because I have spent BDT 2550 for 1 KG of plain flour crust. Sorry, I could not take it.
Not for food Negative review for making Dhaka city polluted by posters ..too much annoying.

Ordered a slice of Chicken Tikka and a Cheese Pizza. However The served crust was way over toasted. It was unimaginably dry and hard. I am sorry to say i went to sbarro with high expectations fuelled by all the reviews i saw. I have to say I was quite disappointed

Drinks were literally not up to the mark. It felt like Water. Out of 7 flavors, 3 flavors should not be beef. For some people there was very little variations of Pizza. And had to wait for each slice initially which really killed the appetite.
I waited for half an hour but still no pizza.Shitty service
poor service During unlimited pizza offer , Had to wait approximately 30 minutes for a pizza slice ,very disappointing .

[I did not have Sbarro's food so my review is based on their service only] Earlier today I messaged Sbarro asking if they took any reservations, and they replied saying that they did not in fact take any reservations and that it's on first come first serve basis. Which seemed fine to me. When I went there later on today, it was jam packed with people as expected but what surprised me was when the guard asked me if I had a reserved table or not. And then one of the waiters as...ked me the same thing as well. Lots of people were still going inside because they had reserved their seats and I just stood there surprised that they denied taking reservations earlier today and lo and behold they actually did take reservations. In the end me and my siblings had to dine elsewhere. This kind of confusing service is extremely disappointing, especially coming from Sbarro which is widely lauded to have amazing service. And this was our first time there too. My question is this, if you did take reservations then why deny that fact to a potential customer?

They make the strongest crusts in town. I mean you can literally hurt people with the slices of pizzas, they are so hard!!! The layer of cheese is so thin that it can easily beat Megan Fox's hip. On the positive side, The slices were colder than their AC for sure. Chilling experience in a hot weather!!! You can also eat the slices upside down. ... Don't worry, the toppings are glued, so they won't fall off. What a trick to impress your girlfriend!!! Ofcourse, if you have one. A slice of cold, hard, ruti with little less harder toppings. Even the garlic mushroom had too much garlic!!! Pepsi was literally the best thing on your menu!!! On a serious note, if you are charging 220+vat for a slice, i expect quality!!! You are branding pizzas and serving absolute disappointment.

ok place to hang out and eat a lot of pizza! air conditioning needs a bit work though. service average, food slightly above average, tried almost all types, loved some hated some so you get the picture.

Unlimited pizza offer rated 599/- net in their advertisement. But when they gave us bill claimed 15% vat (around 181 tk) in regular voucher. I protested why they included vat but they did not give me any answers. Please protest the illegal activities loudly so that others can aware about their misdeeds & ill intention....

Last week I went to cherry drops to avail the offer "buy 1 pizza and get 2 pasta free". When I went inside they said the pizza prices are not the regular price they gave me an increased price than regular menu which was 1000tk and it clearly said VAT included and then when I ordered they said VAT will be added. Without any argument, I had to leave the restaurant because I didn't want to eat from a restaurant who spreads false advertisement to get customers inside their restaurant. No wonder their rating fell below 4. Keep celebrating 4 years with false advertisement and wasting peoples time.

A lot of expectation from their recent offer (buy 1 pizza and get 2 pasta free) but I am sorry to said their four seasons Pizza (12") and Pasta (same type, though ordered was two different types) was not delicious at all. So please try to do your food quality better. Totally disappointed at your work. Never order again.

The Blissful BBQ Bash of m cafe costing 300 TK. The presentation of the food was good but they can improve it,well the taste of the food was not up to the mark.The rice tastes good but the quantity of it needs to be increased,the salad that they gave I think it should be sliced more thickly then it would have been better. On the other hand the BBQ ckicken was perfect, according to me it was perfectly cooked, in each an every bite the juicy flavoured of the chicken could be felt ,the BBQ sauce was a perfect combination with it.So over all it was not up to the mark of the pricing stratagy,the pricing should be around 230-250 TK. I know that a cafe have some overhead costs but still charging 300 TK on it, makes the food expensive comparing to the taste and quantity.

Went there today. Wanted to order rice bowl. But its for student only. However it does not say on their advert. Ended up spending money in chicken quesdalia instead . yaak!! Not up to the mark. Total waste of money.

Tried their buffer dinner offer. Was not expecting this! We went quite early around 7.30-8 but already all the food was cold! They warmer was not working. After mentioning it they fixed it. Worst suchi i ever tried, also with a foul smell!! But the worst was when we tried their firni it was totally sour with a foul smell. We showed it to the waiter n latter the chef confirmed that it has gone bad. They offered us another but by that time we were done! The manager was present but he didn't say anything! On the other hand the waiters and the assistant manager was nicer n more polite. Other Food items were okay, nothing extraordinary. But this type of management is not something you expect from a restaurant like this!

I have always been a big fan of North End, but had a terrible experience today. Well, the coffee was very good as usual but the desperate effort of the staffs to close at 11 pm felt a bit weird and extremely uncomfortable. I went to North End at Cityscape tower with my Wife and Brother in law at around 10:30 pm. By that time they have already rounded up all the chairs and tables, which itself is not right if the official closing time is 11 pm. We ordered 4 cappuccino and were... waiting for our Sister to arrive.When she arrived at 11:00 pm they had already closed the sliding door. One of the staffs stopped her outside when she said my coffee has been ordered and they are waiting inside, which can be seen through the glass. The staffs kept arguing with her and given that the sliding door has already been turned off she got hurt hitting the glass door. This is sad as you feel unwelcome in a reputed coffee boutique. I personally feel this is what happens when you leave everything on the staffs. Quite a bad experience!

Then just left the restaurant without having food with disgust. Just a disgusting experience. Hey Pizza Inn, if you cannot comply what you offer than do not do this mal-practice. End of the day service makes the difference.
Good response for home delivery but (Cheese Lovers Medium (10.5in)) It was one of the worst pizza in my life...Why people are cheated by you?

Horrible Ramadan offer.I really liked their regular pizza.But the pizza in Ramadan offer tastes horrible.It was just a thick slice of bread with very less toppings.It was not edible.Complete waste of money.The customer service in banani was also poor.

If you tell me this is the size of the pizza you're suppose to get when you order a small size pizza then I have nothing to say. You guys have taken small to another level. When we pay 430tk for a small pizza and you gave me pizza the size of a cup you should be ashamed of it. Even a mini kids meal pizza is bigger than this. If you're gonna cost pricey food make sure to provide good food and not loot the customers. I'm never going back there again.!
just found this in my pizza which we ordered this is outrageous , actually thought it might hardened cheese , but it's so hard can't even break with our teeth .almost swallowed it

Normally i like ur regular pizza. But its deceiving when u r giving ramadan unlimited pizza offer. Its completely full of bread with least amount of toppings which tastes horrible. Some of the waiter was very slow. Complete waste of 899tk. Stop betraying ur customer.

Worst pizza in town..this is most disgusting pizza i have ever tasted in my life...the topping was maybe 1mm thick?

So I have been a customer of Pizza Inn since it started in Dhaka with their own building in Gulshan,Dhaka. I really liked eating pizza here. But what yesterday happened what just really disappointing. Look people make mistakes. I know that. I saw mistakes in Pizzas since day one. But you people improved. Then you reached the top of pizza chain (atleast to me). But yesterday's service just dragged you down to the last. So like any other day, I went with my family to eat ...pizza around 7 p.m. I sat at my usual place in second floor. Then there was this offer going on where you buy 1 large pizza and get another one absolutely free. So i ordered this BBQ Chicken classic pizza with the another one Pizza Inn Special which costed more. So obviously they took the second one as my order and the first one as the free one. It took them about 20 mins which is usual. They first gave the pizza inn special pizza. No fork or knives were in the table. They never offered one too. Then after I asked, they gave them. The waiter also had lack of knowledge about service (It was not his fault btw because he wasn't trained well. And i even tipped him well because he was really young) Then there came my usual and most favourite flavour BBQ. But it was really disappointing when i tasted the second one (BBQ). It tasted exactly like the first was. It was extremely disappointing to eat two pizzas with the same flavour even i ordered two different ones. I asked the waiter about that but he said he didn't know. I hope you review you your mistakes because I myself never expected this kind of service. My family also got disappointed which made me feel sad because I was the one to force them to eat here whilst they wanted to eat elsewhere....
taste less pizza. bole kina thin crust, bt actually thick crustï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½
Pizza taste was very poor n less chess only bread taste coming so next time i won't come....Plz increase ur ingredients coz we r paying for it....
Just hate those pizza.
We were very hungry but had to wait too long to get their pizza at uttara branch. Much longer waiting than expected. Must improve service.
worst Pizza I ever had, They shoud remove the most loveable word PIZZA from their name and put something else.

A story of disappointment and deception -_- Poorest food, price and service I have ever experienced! I am totally shocked at your response to the queries of the customers. It took about 40 minutes to deliver pizzas. Almost all the items are overpriced. The pasta I ordered was not worth 475 taka at all. Also, it was almost chilled, didn't look like you cooked it after I ordered. The waiter was always confused to our questions. You put the different columns for pizzas and crusts, well fine. But why there were no thin crusts which we ordered? Your worthless waiter was insisting us to order the high priced ones! That's how the pizza wich was shown taka 660 or something turned into 990 taka! Cunning policy, indeed. Totally disappointed at your work. Never coming again.

First of all they are not worthy enough to give even one star but since this is the minimum rating, I am giving one. Their delivery is very time consuming and on top of that they more or less forced us to take their stuffed crust which is of BDT 295. They have thin crush which they don't charge extra money for but that was not available. So it clearly proves that they are taking extra money for their so called stuffed crust forcefully! Now a days customers are willing to spend extra money on good food so you don't have to steal it from us showing lame excuses. If that is your business strategy then I suggest you to develop your business skills along with your pizza taste! They wrote BDT 600++ for their medium sized pizza but they took 990 instead because of stuffed crust which is so not worth the money!
Worst Sphaghetti I ever had in my life...n amount was not even enough for one person ï¿½ never going there(uttara branch) again -_-
W.t.f. pizza in s..ked me ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½i really wanna ï¿½ï¿½
one of the worst place to dine in & pizza's are worthless to eat as well

With previous several times good experiences yesterday I went to police plaza concord brach at around 2:30 pm & wanted to place order their "buy 1 medium pizza, get 1 free" offer. But they denied to take order saying it will need more than 1 and a half hour (which will exceed the offer time), as they don't have dough of medium size. it is only the large size that I can order!! I never expected this kind of disgusting trick from such a reputed place!
Very very poor amount of ingredints in pizza mainly the amount of cheese.totally worthless.

Ordered through their online home delivery system at 01:13 p.m. and received the food at 03:15 pm. but they said it would be delivered by 02:30 p.m. When I called at 02:30 p.m. to ask about the order they informed me that the ordered had not been placed due to a server error, although I had already talked to them before that and they informed nothing then. When we asked for a discount for the horrible service, they said they would give a discount but the delivery man asked for the whole bill. Pizza was ok but will not be ordering again...at least not online. If you cannot keep up your own servers then you should make deals with third-parties like hungrynaki.

This the most hazardous childish disappointing packaging I've ever seen my life ... Seriously you need upgrade your packageing .. Otherwise this will turn into serious Complan & I'll be first one to report

First of all if i start talking about the pizza, it was almost tasteless. I ordered one of their large pizzas, and due to a running offer i got one for free. If they cannot provide good quality pizza in an offer, why do they even give such offers! Again, totally disappointed with their slow service. The waiters are not even trained well. Whenever i wanted a tissue or a drinks, they started calling each other to serve me taking 5/10 mins just to come and talk. Never going back.

Poor service. Average quality of pizza, at best they can manage. Unbelievably slow. Ordered three items and it took them one and half hour to serve it. Don't even place tissue on the table: went there with 3 people. And they place just four tissues under forks and knives. and that's it. You want more tissue, they'll listen and will be gone. Ultimately, you have to fetch them yourselves. Paid for about 4k Tk, all of which feels completely wasted on nothing.

Mirpur Branch: Ill behaved waiters! Dont know the simple COURTESY to behave with customers. Whenever i complained it, the manager tried to cover it. LOL. Please take necesary trainings for all your staffs. Never recommend it. You can be one of those customers facing disrespect.

Worst pizza ever tasted. Ordered pizza with sausage crust. They gave it wrong. When complained, they replied saying they got technical issues (which was a very lame excuse). They used local cheese instead of Mozzarella. Made a chaos during providing the bill too. Overall I would have given a negative 5 if there was an option. All I can say is, train your waiters first before starting an outlet.

Another thing to save the time for making pizza quick they just put cheese and toppings on their ready made crust. Then they put it in the oven . Done in 5mins may be less than that. I'm not lying . Still have couple of slices left in my fridge. Plz guys instead of bringing more branch , bring some quality. And for me adios 'Pizza inn'. From Uttara - a never coming back customer.

I don't know why they need to swallow something they cannot digest! Worst experience ever... if you can't serve your own menu items then you should close the outlet of uttara.. and stuff was like please get out... just because gas problem in uttara they can't even serve frnchfries... also they can't make coldbeverage items.. funny.. btw cant explain the test of the pizza.. crust is like toast... so please if you can't maintain your standard then stop making foolish people.

I ordered 2 medium pizza , 1 garlic bread 2 mushroom for home. When I recieved it was packed. They said everything is ok. I came back home and 1 spicy mushroom was missing. Not acceptable at all. Not recommending mirpur outlet.

I liked the ultra thin crusted pizzas...but it seems the chefs often forget to season the pizzas properly. We went yesterday to enjoy the BOGO offer at Gulshan branch, pizzas were good but we had to add seasoning to make the taste perfect, the pizzas were under seasoned. Pizza quality degraded. Better quality pizza you will find in Taltola, Khilgaon Chowdhury etc places. Not value for money.

dear pizza inn maintain the standard when you give such offer. if you cant afford it then please dont give such promotional offer.people came to enjoy pizaa not to waste money on bread and cheese -_-. went to pizza inn and ordered chicken bbq special pizza large and got a free large pizza as well. but the quality is too low. 80% of the pizza was bread,crust was hard like toast and cheese quality OMG it feels like rubber after 5 minutes. first and last visit to pizza inn. recommending people not to go during offer time. dont know about the quality in regular time.

Pizza inn shouldn't introduce such offer where they cant maintain the minimum standard. This has been my favourite pizza shop in town always even in such offer time. This time i heard so many bad comments from friends but with my previous experience I ignored to believe them and here i am today with utter disappointments. I believe even my maid can made better pizza than this. Most surprisingly the guy serving the pizza doesn't even know which flavor they are serving. I guess this is the last time i am visiting pizza inn.

Pizza Inn had always been a top choice for me in terms of ordering pizza at home. They had always been very cooperative till today. I ordered from the Crazy offer for me and my friends and what I got to hear was they had only 2 delivery man and both of them were out. So they can't. With such minimum manpower, it's not possible to offer good service. If it's not possible for them to serve their customers in spite of having so much busy schedule, they should reconsider their home delivery service then.

I went to your Uttara outlet to avail the "FNF Offer" today around 09:00PM. Before going there, i checked your website and decided to order One Roasted Garlic Chicken Pizza Large & One Deep Dish Pizza Large. When I was ordering Roasted Garlic Chicken Pizza Large, the waiter told me that there is no such Pizza of Pizza Inn named Roasted Garlic Chicken Pizza Large. When I told him that I have checked your website, he replied it can't be there. After that when I told him about t...he Deep Dish Pizza, he replied it is not included in the Offer. He also told me "Deep Dish Pizza is very EXPENSIVE. It will cost around TK.1800." Now my questions are: 1. If there is no such Pizza of Pizza Inn named Roasted Garlic Chicken Pizza Large, then why you are displaying in your website? 2. If I have checked your website, then I am certain about the prices of the Products. Do you tell your customers that "Sir, this Pizza is expensive. Don't take this one? Later I ordered BBQ Chicken Classic Large & Meaty Max Pizza Large. This is not the first time I am getting this kind of customer service from your Uttara Branch. Several months back, I experienced this kind of unprofessional customer service. But I ignored that time, because I get better service in your Banani & Gulshan Branch. You simply can't run your business with this kind of unprofessional team. One will not surely pay for getting this kind of shitty service.

Stupidest service at your Uttara outlet. your staff doesn't have any clue of your online offers. They first said Pizzainn does not have any pizza called Roasted garlic chicken pizza. Then i ordered deep dish pizza - Hear this how idiotic a staff can be - Your staff told me deep dish pizza is costly. I told that moron cost is my call not his. then he said deep dish pizza is not part of offer. This is my last time at PIZZAIN. PATHETIC

Came today for the first time here with loads of expectations. I had today one chicken tandoori pizza, one french fries, chicken drumsticks and one apple juice. The pizza was so oily and loaded with cheese and for that reason, i didn't like that. I couldn't find the exact taste of pizza because all i could find was the taste of cheese and cheese. So i didn't like the pizza at all. The french fries was good btw. But the drumsticks was so tasteless that i couldn't eat them all.... They were loaded with so much masalas that i couldn't find the actual taste of it also. I didn't like that one also. Lastly comes the apple juice. I couldn't understand whether it was apple juice or not. Because bad smell was coming from that juice. So i didn't have that one also. Not going to come here anymore. Waste of money!!!!! Another thing, the waiters which are serving don't know which food is available for the day. They have to ask their superior all the time. Isn't it annoying?

I went there with high expectations but my god wish I knew what was waiting for me. The price was exceedingly high but food quality was rather poor, taste was cliched. I went there with few of my relatives & it was a total embarassment for me. Most horrible part was, all of us had food poisoning.
Very Poor Service. Out of 12 slices I had yesterday,I could only have 3 flavors. And waited for more but they said it will take 15-20 mins more. Being pissed off I left
Poor sitting arrangement. They treat customers as beggers.
Worst Seating Arrangement in Unlimited Pizza Offer in this Ramadan.
900 taka per person is quiet expensive. Must deliver soup items.

Poorest service ever! Went there yesterday for iftar and their service was terrible taste and quality of pizza was disgusting! I always loved pizzas from pizza inn but after yesterday their awful service made me hating this place so much. Don't go there for unlimited pizza offer! Service 1/10 Taste 2/10
Worst place ever for having pizzas. The core reason is because of their poor service

Pizza inn is my 2nd favorite place for pizzas. I always loved their pizza and behavior. But today I was very disappointed tasting their pizzas. I found it very dry and not up to the mark. Got 2 pizzas an hour back through foodpanda. I must say I'm very disappointed with the amount of toppings you guys have given. But the amount of cheese surely covered the empty areas; no doubt about that! I'm sorry to say, but I'm never ordering pizzas from you guys.

I ordered a 4kg rainbow cake for my Office Promotional celebration and I got seriously ashamed because of your cake which tasted really bad.. The food color was too much, the cream didnt blend well...over all it was really disgusting. I spent 7200/- just to buy some criticism towards me... i will never ever buy anything from you.

Yesterday, at the Gulshan 1 branch (opposite to DESCO office) of Coopers, I found the bakery section infested with insects. Instead of removing the contaminated food, the staff was busy in removing the insects after I showed that to him. It was a very disappointing experience. Please take prompt action.
they behave like stupid... and their services is not that good..
The handwriting on the cake is really disheartened. How can I put that on someone's Birthday?

Went there a week back for Iftar, very limited items were served (was quite surprised to see) and they were not refilling properly, some items were served after around one hour of Iftar. Dessert section was most shocking, I found nothing to take on my plate! It was anything but a five star standard where as they charged us the highest for Iftar in Dhaka!

They didnâ€™t mentioned any card serial numbers on their online promotions of BOGO OFFER.... asking for visa platinum debit cart they told that yes itâ€™s available on it.. but after having lunch they said they have few serial numbers of cards only which can avail this offer.... this is totally harassing for a visitor who visited there after watching their promotions offer....
Its not for food lovers...Less buffet Items....Less tastes.....Less hygiene....I found hair in vegetable.....
Such a Waste of Money in their Iftar and Dinner Buffet , Food was cold late refile , no good taste of anything . Bad People Management as well it was like fish market .

Worst service ever! We bought 2 coupons for the â€˜boishakhi food fairâ€™ on pohela boishakh and when we reach the restaurant (26th floor) they kept telling to wait because they were gonna shift it to lobby. We complained and they reluctantly served us food some food and kept us waiting for our remaining food while not even giving us any importance that we kept waiting (even though the food was ready). We got so annoyed we left without even eating. Waste of 1000tk coupon. Worst service and unwelcoming looks from the waiters as we waited for the food. NEVER going back
Very bad service. Food quality was extremely bad. They provided wrong information regarding buy 01 get 01 offer so we had to expense more.
Service at the desk and at the restaurant were 100% terrible!

Not up to the mark........ Totally frustrating :/ :/ expected a lot better
I overall don't like this hotel.... Only photography is real.... Nothing else ...

They are charging almost 4,000 (3,999) BDT for the buffet but do not bother to make arrangement to keep the food warm. Cold food ruined the taste of the items. My brother went there with his guest yesterday & became embarrassed of the food situation. if you don't want to keep your kebabs hot, then don't charge that much cz other buffets are charging less but giving better service than you. Pissed Off
Good menu but mediocre taste. Nothing exciting to the palate. The fruit table was good as was the nehari. Other items were ... Just there.
Below average standard .. Communication with clients is bad nd behaviour should be developed ..

Clearly a waste of time and money . The dishes were way below average . Nothing resembled the advertisement. Pure Deshi cuisine plus a few salads and desserts is not worth 2200 taka. Last but not least , the restroom was dirty and stall was too small for a hotel. ... Pizza Hut has a bigger washroom than yours . Definitely not coming back here anymore . Shall never recommend anyone to come here either .

This was worse experience of being there at eatery restaurant. In the street food market fest there were no Chinese dim sum station. There was sushi but very limited. Bottom line is they show something and in reality they serve something else. This is one way of cheating people. Food quality is very low.
2 elevators to go up to the restaurant?you keep waiting for the lift to go up & come down?? forget it man .. we have other choices in gulshan..

Most of the items were below average. Though there are many dishes, most of them don't deserve more than a bite. The advertisement is not all revealing, though it mentions Buy 1 Get 1 on Stan Chart Cards, there are particular specifications of the cards with offer, not all Standard Chartered Cards are liable to get the offer. And most importantly, though the advertisement mentions the Buffet price to be 3542 ( all inclusive), what has not been mentioned is that this excludes all beverages including water which will be charged at an exhorbitant rate plus 26.5% extra VAT and service charge on that. So those who are planning to go to the Street Food Festival, think twice.

The food was horrible compared to la meridian while taking price in account. The restaurant eatery was small and had a handful to offer. I called them up to enquire about the maki rolls before going and found premade small rolls that was tasteless and looked cheep. Their continental side had few things to offer aswell. All in all dnt waste your money and time.

the one star is for the ambience and the lamb chops in the buffet. all the other items were pretty bad and they sucked. really SUCKED! To be honest its not worth tk.3500 that they are charging per person. who the hell gives papaya and tomato inside a crepe? its really sad when hotels like this provide food like baton rouge! money wasted. please hire some good chefs
Very bad service... That's all I can say... And heavily charged.

Expanding business from Gulshan and Banani to Dhanmondi was a bad move for Pizza Roma basically cause it meant their quality being degraded. A stale pizza diavola with a hard crust and chewy dough was delivered with no sauces or chili flakes, especially when extra sauces was an added request. More than annoying, bad pizzas are just disappointing specifically considering Pizza Roma is the pizzeria we've all come to love.

the worst Pizza I ever ate :( we order the meatball pizza 12" there is total 17balls in pizza (small size)which was fully testless.poor amount of cheese.the pizza was properly not sizzling with salt.the test was like as, "a pizza which is made with brinjal or Eggplants fully dull in test....!!!"

I ordered spaghetti and meatballs. Absolutely horrible. It was dry, bland and tasted microwaved. After coming home i got sick. My partner ordered a beef panini which was Okay at best. Neither justified their price.
I ordered their pizza meatball through Pathao foods and it was a complete disaster. The pizza was to dry and thin that at the first look no one would like to have it.
this page is not acting like a national daily.

I have been with BFC's food since 2004.for me BFC chicken is the best in the town.I have visited almost all the branches in Dhaka and know many outlet managers those who are working for the last 20 years.But it is really sad to say, BFC, Mirpur 10 branch has got some problems. I have been there several times since I have shifted my residence in Mirpur. The staffs are not well mannered. I have shared some of them, incident 1: one... day they have served me wrong drinks, when i objected the waiter said, it is not possible. incident 2: sometime a portion of the total area is blocked, i requested manager, he ignored. last incident: When a half of the sweet corn are eaten i have found some parts of a steel dish washing net inside, I complained they wanted to give another but i said no.The young outlet Manager was in front of me turned around even saying sorry.I was horrified about thinking their cleaning stuff.Hope authority will frequent visit their outlets and will check hygienic food ,cooking stuff and customers feedback's.DROPBOX is the better idea.and managers should be well trained., so that other staffs can perform better.

My first review consisted of 5 stars but today, I am bound to revise my review & mark it with 1 star. I am incredibly annoyed with the quantity & the quality of the food items which they provided from their Dhanmondi branch. I ordered online through pathao food. I ordered their platter, R2, & it seemed to me that I paid 2500+ taka for a mere box of French fries!!! I had the same platter twice, before, but they have seemingly deteriorated the quality & lowered the quantity of ...their food items. Probably, they re-use the oil in which they fry their items. There was a distinct smell of used oil. The fish fingers were unbelievably thin & small. I just could see French fries throughout the box & the calamaries & shrimps were very few in numbers. In Ramadan too, I experienced the same thing. I had enough of Manhattan Fish Market. Never ever going back there or ordering food online from them. They literally have lost a regular customer.

I went to MFM on Saturday around 4:00 pm along with my Family. I ordered 4 dori special and Onion Rings and Mussels. Onion Ring was really bad and dori salad was stale and smell bad. Mussels were ok. We ordered four drinks but even after our meal is completed we did not get the drinks. My kids ordered two Gummy Bear flavour and they did get that either. Kids were extremely disappointed ï¿½
Poor service. Pathetic staff and manager.

Yesterday's azan was at 6.46 PM. The restaurant had served tang and iced tea beforehand. After the azan, everyone around us had food, except 3 tables. I figured they'd be 4/5 mins late. But nope, we waited there till 7.05 PM and got no food, while there was a table of around 15 people who'd received their second servings by that time. One time, a waiter came to our table with food, we got really excited because we'd been somewhat fasting for an extra 15 minutes, but then the ...waiter went back because that food wasn't for our table; such a tease, innit. At around 7 PM while everyone there was eating their fish and chips and we were sitting with our glass of iced tea, they brought us some really unappetizing, complementary soup. I lost it at that point and asked why they are seating people if they can't make enough food. To which they replied "Amra chai na kono customer mon kharap koruk." Bro you aren't serving people food for iftar, I think that's enough for me to "mon kharap." So then we left the place, as soon as we get on the lift they say "Apnader food chole ashche." As if I'm ever going back. We went to BFC and had super wholesome fried chicken. No ragrets, but f u, The Manhattan FISH MARKET Bangladesh. There was more weird shit before this, of course. I'd asked on Facebook whether or not the restaurant takes reservations, and they'd replied that they don't have any booking system in their outlets. They said that they serve people on a "first come, first serve" basis so it'd be best if we show up at least 45 minutes before iftar. I called the number given on your Facebook page and website again today at around 3 pm to check if you really don't take bookings. The cellphone was switched off. So we went to the Dhanmondi outlet at 5 PM today, and they told us they couldn't seat two people because all seats were booked. I told them that whoever manages their social media doesn't know that they take bookings, and if I show up at 5 at a virtually empty restaurant that serves iftar "first come, first get," then I should get a table. Then they found us a table, lol. They took our order for an iftar platter at around 6 pm. After 15 minutes or so, they came to confirm it, and their receipt had the items "garlic mussels, water" whereas we'd ordered fish and chips and chicken tenders. We told them that they'd taken a completely wrong order for some reason. I mean, I'd understand if they'd thought we ordered grilled fish instead of fried, but mussels???? What??? But then we got no food at all because MUSSELS KHAIBI NA TOH MANHATTAN FISH MARKET AISOS KEN

This was my first visit to MFM and my experience was awful. I ordered chicken mussels calamari and for drinks I ordered sunset by the bay and lemongrass cooler. The drinks were so disgusting that we both could not take the second sip of those. The drinks were smelling like cockroach and cough syrup and the chicken was smelly too. The spice in the mussels was not good at all. The only good thing was the fries. I would not recommend this place for anything. We ordered coleslaw which was not served and thank God for that. We had some issues with the bill as well. They should improve the sincerity to their customers.

Last food experience was horrible! I was craving for chicken cashew nut salad & thus ordered this from them, along with a set menu via Hungrynaki. The cashew nut salad which they provide with their set menu is completely different from that of the individual dish. I haven't, in my whole, tasted such disgusting chicken cashew nut salad. It smells like beguni & pakora. They fry extemely thin & mini slices of chicken,(almost invisible), by covering them up with a huge amount of ...besan & flour which is responsible for this weird smell. There was abnormal thick coating in each of the chicken slices. The cashew nut salad which they provide with the set menu atleast contains capicum slices but the individual dish contains onions & cucumber only! Horrible...horrible experience. My craving was being killed by their food & I literally threw it away. They should & must stop cheating people by coating up their meat pieces with unnecessary amount of besan & flour to make them look bigger. I had the same experience with one of their beef items. The quality of their wrapped prawns has deteriorated too. There is too much of noodles & the prawns are incredibly thin & small. & the dish is too try but previously their wrapped prawns were juicy. I used to order from them a lot via Hungrynaki but the last time made me too disappointed with the quality of their dishes & have decided not to order from them anymore since you get only fried besan & flour.
